Your funding will enable JoyWheel
Yoga &amp
column2: Wellness to grow and serve the community in many important ways.

column1: Some of the things we are the most excited about and that will have immediate

impact are:

·
Making
capital improvements to the space—to make it as welcoming as possible
for students and clients, as well as ensuring their safety
Enabling
us to transition off of paper tracking and sign-ins and move to an electronic
HIPAA compliant platform that is both accessible and more eco-friendly
·
Accelerating the growth of our administrative assistance initiatives which will increase the
reach of our tenant professionals, the yoga studio, and regional wellness.
·
Expanding JoyService, the portion of our efforts completely dedicated to local and global
programs keeping with the Triple Bottom Line. JoyService adopts families
locally for free classes and offerings, and hosts fun events for many things
including a school in Kenya.
·
Helping us fulfill our mission to furnish the space with recycled and upcycled materials
as much as possible and to work with local artisans to greenly warm and outfit

the space.


All funders will receive regular wellness newsletters from Erin and Adam with JoyWheel Yoga &
column2:
Wellness updates, health resources, and class options. Local WNY funders receive three Open classes at no charge and out of town funders have their choice of perks from an organic t-shirt to an original yoga pose of your choice photographed within the space and mailed directly to you. So you don't have the cash to support us financially but you are feeling our mission and want to help?!? Great! Please spread the word and help us help others realize their amazing potential! 

About Us:

column1: Erin &
column2: Adam created Schifferli Works, LLC in 2008 to help

column1: people create their best health in a realistic, balanced way. Erin is a NYS
Registered Dietitian Nutritionist and member of the Academy
of Nutrition and Dietetics. She is also a Registered Yoga
Teacher and member of the Yoga Alliance. She constantly continues her
education in the health and wellness fields, maintaining
a professional portfolio and following her passion for learning.
Adam is a Computer Scientist, Creative Writer &amp
Teacher, and served as Director of Operations within a fast-paced
financial institution for over a decade, preparing him for
the professional demands of running a family business.
Erin and Adam fell in love with each other as teens, married as

young adults, and have grown a family while pursuing their own passions along the way. They strive as individuals, a couple, and a family toward authenticity in their relationships with others with a holistic respectful approach. Ghandi says, ""one person can gently shake the world,"" at JWY&amp
column2: W students are encouraged through healthy sate of being, self awareness, and mindful living to make conscious choices daily. This mindfulness along with their four children, Owen, Liam, Aeva, and Rose, inspired them to found

column1: a yoga and wellness center that exists to soulfully nourish and inspire the
community in a mindful, sustainable way. They have experienced first-hand
what happens when individuals invest in their own growth, seeing the positive

benefits in their children and their larger community. With a belief that we are all one, the motivation is to empower individuals: it may be through a yoga class, a massage, a JoyTalk, or a wellness course, whatever the source, when people feel well there is an exciting social effect. By growing themselves the ripples effect their families, their communities, and eventually, the world!
The Triple Bottom Line Defined:
The TBL is an accounting framework that incorporates three dimensions
of performance: social, environmental, and financial. This differs from
traditional reporting frameworks as it includes ecological (or environmental)
and social measures. The TBL dimensions are also commonly called the three Ps:
People, Planet and Profits.
People:
JoyWheel Yoga &
column2: Wellness thrives because of its dedication

column1: to authentically serving individuals. We support local schools with free
classes for athletes on their own campus, we adopt a family each month to
receive free yoga classes with total anonymity and zero strings attached, and
we open up the space for others to use. Some examples include: <i>A Talk
on Consciousness, where local high school students discussed and a
professional panel of speakers, how to be more mindful in the modern world. The
talk was well received buy the broader community and inspired a second free
comminty event held in June, about Education Choices. Both talks were offered
by the Academe of Aurora, a local high school group. We also hosted a Poetry
Slam for Crossroads Springs Africa (CSA) Institute, a not-for Profit in Kenya
that supports over 350 children who have lost at least one parent to AIDS, and
we share the space for local support groups, and book clubs to enjoy. 100% of
the proceeds form this event went to CSA, and many shared their creative works
whilst supporting a worthy cause. This event also inspired a second and third
event similar in nature. People seek to ""be good and do good,"" when
given the opportunity to do so. We are thrilled to offer many such opportunities.
Planet:
The studio itself is filled with recycled materials from
reclaimed barn wood and re-purposed goods to recycled paper products. We
believe in ecologically conscious living and working, so we model that
behavior. By remaining locally minded, we have had the privilege to work with
local businesses, artisans, and craftsmen in order to grow and maintain the
space.
Imagine a center where
interactions on every level were based on respect, honoring each other, a space
where wellness professionals collaborate to meet students, clients, and
peoples' needs. We are a collaborative minded space that does not seek to
compete but rather to network and work together within the yoga and mindfulness
community as well as the local WNY community… and the world in total in order
to serve one another! We reduce aggressive behaviors and model compassion,
tolerance, patience and peaceful interactions, making the planet a better pace
to live.
Profits:
WE OFFER VARIETY AND ACCESSIBILITY
This yoga studio and wellness serves as a community
resource for health and wellness care. By following a triple bottom Line
business model we use an ethical fresh approach during every step of business
we hope to be a leader for other businesses worldwide. That means we reinvest profits
into the center and all of the people who patronize it.
JoyWheel Yoga &
column2: Wellness, located inthe heart of the village of East Aurora, NY, currently runs as a yoga

column1: studio with a student base of over 600 registered students. It was established
in May of 2013 and transitioned to a space triple its original size during the
winter. Many of those same students seek out and receive extra wellness
services such as massage and yoga therapy in a private setting or small group
setting. With the demand increasing for more wellness services, the expansion
into a full service community wellness center is the natural progression of the

entity. There will be 5 Wellness Suites located above the yoga studio where wellness professionals can work together to meet the needs of individuals, small groups, schools, and the community.

Challenges:

Our limitation right now is lack of assistance. The students and community have allowed us to grow, however we are in need of more administrative assistance and the proper programming / technology to allow JWY&
column2: W to expand and serve all those looking for services. With funding we will hire competent staff that believes in our mission in order to meet students, clients, and all who seek assistance. We look forward to offering job sources to the WNY community,

column4:
>Gratitude:

We thank you in advance for your willingness

column1: to serve and be a part of this mindful movement. Every thought, every effort,

and every choice makes a difference. We feel your love and we are grateful. ~Namaste

column2: >UPDATE: Fat Yoga videos are available online thanks to our awesome backers.  You can find them here!
column4: >""Fat Yoga has helped me rediscover and appreciate my

column1: body again. We get so many messages that our bodies are ""wrong"", it's
nice to be able to celebrate how amazing our bodies really are, fat or not.
Since starting classes, I've gotten so much stronger and more flexible. I love
the physical exertion of the class (we do get sweaty!) and I love the challenge
of learning and mastering new poses. I feel strong and centered, and I find
that I move through my own life with more ease and peace."" — April / High
School Teacher
The Thing about Fat Yoga®

column2: >First and most obvious, Fat Yoga classes are tailored to people who may not be the stereotypical yoga student. While most of us identify as fat, it's certainly not a requirement for participation. You do NOT need to be a specific size to be welcome at Fat Yoga.

column1: Poses are presented and modified to each individual's ability. The size of our thighs, arms, bellies, and butts all change the way we are capable of expressing the traditional asanas (poses). Fat Yoga honors and embraces our differences and strives to create an environment where all bodies can do all poses.

Fat Yoga has no objective or claim towards weight loss. Frankly, we are not interested in it. We focus on strength building, flexibility, balance, self-acceptance and peace of mind. There is much evidence of yoga's transformative powers. Through a committed yoga practice, we can embrace our relationship with our bodies and find joy in movement.
Fat Yoga currently holds ongoing classes through the week at

our own location in Portland, Oregon.  But we would like to reach out beyond Portland, which is why we want to produce these videos.  We will be hosting the online classes on Vimeo so that everyone has access to Fat Yoga anywhere, at any time.  

Having this video available we will be able to bring Fat Yoga to
column2: >everyone- regardless of size- with an opportunity to enjoy the benefits of yoga. Yoga is an excellent transitional fitness option as well. Our yogis get a great workout complete with messy sweating and active breathing without feeling self-conscious. The poses and movements strengthen muscles, tendons &amp
column3: organs. Not to mention the numerous benefits for bone, joint and circulatory health. Fat Yoga also provides more intangible benefits such as increased confidence, better balance, and a general feeling of bad-assery.

column1: The Video Project
The Fat Yoga videos will put you right into our All Levels
Classes.  Classes are structured so each person has autonomy over their
own yoga practice. Focus is on breath, alignment and postures through the basic
Sun Salutation poses. We'll develop an awareness of and connection to our body’s
amazing capabilities. This type of practice fosters active lifestyles, by
awaking &amp
column2: activating core strength. These classes bring the heat, working

column1: ourselves right up to a nice, glistening sheen, while still allowing space for
a gentle practice. We will cover the whole body
ribcage, hips and legs.
The videos will be presented in a series of 15 short videos
that can be put together into a customizable yoga session.  These videos
will allow you to have variety in your workout day-to-day
choose-your-own adventure!
We have chosen a local video production company to make the
the video for us (who made our awesome pitch video!), but we need you to help
fund this project!  We are a small studio, and can not front the money to

pay the production company without your help.

We are asking for $9777 to fund this project.  That money will be going to pay our production company and other production costs associated with making and hosting these videos online.  AND your rewards!  And did you see those awesome rewards?

If we don't reach our goal, we will still get the funds and they will go toward the project, we will just have to cut corners with production costs and scale back on the quantity of videos we can produce.

If we exceed our goal, we have stretch goals to produce even more videos and increase the production value of the videos.  Closed Captioning is an option we would like to have available on our videos that will cost us a little extra.  Plus, we would like to get a TV to mount in the studio so that we can share the videos in-studio.

What you can do
• Contribute to our project! Just contributing $1 will help us to our goal, and keep you apprised of our progress with backers-only updates!
• Share our project with your friends!  Please use the share features below the video to get the word out.

Perks

Interested in multiple perks?  Just submit separate contributions for each perk you are interested in.  We will combine items for shipment when that time comes.

<li>Sun Salutations:  Anna, founder of Fat Yoga®, will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.  One Sun Salutation is tough, 10 can be a struggle, but lets see how many we can get Anna to do!  We are planning to do all the honorary Sun Salutations in one marathon session, and we will film it for you all to see!<div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""326"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FRZUg0wFw0aU%3Ffeature%3Doembed&amp

• Radical Self Love Poster: A poster to hang up in your room, office, anywhere you need a good reminder to love your body today.  Glossy 11 x 17"" print, folded in half for shipping.  This is not the final poster, but it could be something like this:

• Honorary Membership Kit: You will receive a Fat Yoga logo sticker 3"" square, a Fat Backer Fat Yoga bumper sticker, a Fat Yoga cloth patch, and a Radical Self Love Postcard (a mini version of the poster). Show your Fat Yoga love!

• Tank Top: This limited edition tank top is just for you, our backers!  The tanks are unisex in style and size.  The color of the tanks is beige with dark red ink on the front and the back.  Available in generous sizes Small through 12X. Our tanks are made in the USA.

• Vimeo Video Access: You will receive a special code that you can use on Vimeo so that you get permenant access to the Fat Yoga video series without further payment.  You will be required to sign-up for a free Vimeo account in order to redeem the promo code.

• Early Bird Whole Shebang Special: Limited to the first 25 Fat Backers!  Get a whole bunch of awesome rewards for a great price!  But act fast, supplies are limited! Includes the Vimeo video access, Tank Top, Membership Kit, Poster, and Anna will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.
• The Whole Shebang: Get a whole bunch of awesome rewards for a great price! Includes the Vimeo video access, Tank Top, Membership Kit, Poster, and Anna will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.

• Yoga Consultation: You will get your own personal, 90 minute yoga consultation with Anna, founder of Fat Yoga. If you are in the Portland, Oregon area it can be in person at the Fat Yoga studio.  If you are elsewhere around the world this will be via Skype or other popular video call service. We will not be providing the technology assistance for you to be able to cooperate, so please be sure you are able to perform a video call on your own.  Another option could be a phone call conversation consultation, but would obviously not be visual.

• Day with Anna: Lunch and an adventure around Portland, Oregon with Anna, founder of Fat Yoga.  You will need to get yourself to Portland, but once you are here you will meet up with Anna for a Fatastic afternoon of fun!  We will pay for your delicious, comfort food lunch (according on what you like to eat) and provide transportation around town for the afternoon during the adventure.
• Video Release Party (perk canceled for lack of interest)

Update March 21: if you are sponsoring perks that will need to be shipped internationally, it would be a big help to us if you would not mind adding an extra $10-15 to help cover international shipping costs. Thanks for the consideration! We wouldn't be able to do this without you awesome people.

School Teacher
The Thing about Fat Yoga®

First and most obvious, Fat Yoga classes are tailored to people who may not be the stereotypical yoga student. While most of us identify as fat, it's certainly not a requirement for participation. You do NOT need to be a specific size to be welcome at Fat Yoga.

Poses are presented and modified to each individual's ability. The size of our thighs, arms, bellies, and butts all change the way we are capable of expressing the traditional asanas (poses). Fat Yoga honors and embraces our differences and strives to create an environment where all bodies can do all poses.

Fat Yoga has no objective or claim towards weight loss. Frankly, we are not interested in it. We focus on strength building, flexibility, balance, self-acceptance and peace of mind. There is much evidence of yoga's transformative powers. Through a committed yoga practice, we can embrace our relationship with our bodies and find joy in movement.
Fat Yoga currently holds ongoing classes through the week at

our own location in Portland, Oregon.  But we would like to reach out beyond Portland, which is why we want to produce these videos.  We will be hosting the online classes on Vimeo so that everyone has access to Fat Yoga anywhere, at any time.  Having this video available we will be able to bring Fat Yoga to everyone- regardless of size- with an opportunity to enjoy the benefits of yoga. Yoga is an excellent transitional fitness option as well. Our yogis get a great workout complete with messy sweating and active breathing without feeling self-conscious. The poses and movements strengthen muscles, tendons & organs. Not to mention the numerous benefits for bone, joint and circulatory health. Fat Yoga also provides more intangible benefits such as increased confidence, better balance, and a general feeling of bad-assery.
The Video Project
The Fat Yoga videos will put you right into our All Levels
Classes.  Classes are structured so each person has autonomy over their
own yoga practice. Focus is on breath, alignment and postures through the basic
Sun Salutation poses. We'll develop an awareness of and connection to our body’s
amazing capabilities. This type of practice fosters active lifestyles, by
awaking & activating core strength. These classes bring the heat, working
ourselves right up to a nice, glistening sheen, while still allowing space for
a gentle practice. We will cover the whole body
ribcage, hips and legs.
The videos will be presented in a series of 15 short videos
that can be put together into a customizable yoga session.  These videos
will allow you to have variety in your workout day-to-day
choose-your-own adventure!
We have chosen a local video production company to make the
the video for us (who made our awesome pitch video!), but we need you to help
fund this project!  We are a small studio, and can not front the money to

pay the production company without your help.We are asking for $9777 to fund this project.  That money will be going to pay our production company and other production costs associated with making and hosting these videos online.  AND your rewards!  And did you see those awesome rewards?If we don't reach our goal, we will still get the funds and they will go toward the project, we will just have to cut corners with production costs and scale back on the quantity of videos we can produce.If we exceed our goal, we have stretch goals to produce even more videos and increase the production value of the videos.  Closed Captioning is an option we would like to have available on our videos that will cost us a little extra.  Plus, we would like to get a TV to mount in the studio so that we can share the videos in-studio.What you can do
Contribute to our project! Just contributing $1 will help us to our goal, and keep you apprised of our progress with backers-only updates!
Share our project with your friends!  Please use the share features below the video to get the word out.
PerksInterested in multiple perks?  Just submit separate contributions for each perk you are interested in.  We will combine items for shipment when that time comes.

Sun Salutations:  Anna, founder of Fat Yoga®, will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.  One Sun Salutation is tough, 10 can be a struggle, but lets see how many we can get Anna to do!  We are planning to do all the honorary Sun Salutations in one marathon session, and we will film it for you all to see!

Radical Self Love Poster: A poster to hang up in your room, office, anywhere you need a good reminder to love your body today.  Glossy 11 x 17"" print, folded in half for shipping.  This is not the final poster, but it could be something like this:

Honorary Membership Kit: You will receive a Fat Yoga logo sticker 3"" square, a Fat Backer Fat Yoga bumper sticker, a Fat Yoga cloth patch, and a Radical Self Love Postcard (a mini version of the poster). Show your Fat Yoga love!

Tank Top: This limited edition tank top is just for you, our backers!  The tanks are unisex in style and size.  The color of the tanks is beige with dark red ink on the front and the back.  Available in generous sizes Small through 12X. Our tanks are made in the USA.

Vimeo Video Access: You will receive a special code that you can use on Vimeo so that you get permenant access to the Fat Yoga video series without further payment.  You will be required to sign-up for a free Vimeo account in order to redeem the promo code.

Early Bird Whole Shebang Special: Limited to the first 25 Fat Backers!  Get a whole bunch of awesome rewards for a great price!  But act fast, supplies are limited! Includes the Vimeo video access, Tank Top, Membership Kit, Poster, and Anna will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.
The Whole Shebang: Get a whole bunch of awesome rewards for a great price! Includes the Vimeo video access, Tank Top, Membership Kit, Poster, and Anna will do a Sun Salutation in your honor.

Yoga Consultation: You will get your own personal, 90 minute yoga consultation with Anna, founder of Fat Yoga. If you are in the Portland, Oregon area it can be in person at the Fat Yoga studio.  If you are elsewhere around the world this will be via Skype or other popular video call service. We will not be providing the technology assistance for you to be able to cooperate, so please be sure you are able to perform a video call on your own.  Another option could be a phone call conversation consultation, but would obviously not be visual.

Day with Anna: Lunch and an adventure around Portland, Oregon with Anna, founder of Fat Yoga.  You will need to get yourself to Portland, but once you are here you will meet up with Anna for a Fatastic afternoon of fun!  We will pay for your delicious, comfort food lunch (according on what you like to eat) and provide transportation around town for the afternoon during the adventure.
Video Release Party (perk canceled for lack of interest)

Update March 21: if you are sponsoring perks that will need to be shipped internationally, it would be a big help to us if you would not mind adding an extra $10-15 to help cover international shipping costs. Thanks for the consideration! We wouldn't be able to do this without you awesome people.",2.0,1,"1 Campaign

When I was an occupational therapy student, a classmate asked me what area of OT I would like to work in. It took a few minutes - if that - to know what I wanted to be involved in. I had a vision of a treatment centre that I wanted to develop. A year later I developed an infection that turned chronic. Through my journey to regain my health I discovered another dimension - which has led to my developing a new model. The journey has given me much insight and has enabled me to develop services that are pioneering in my field - and which my OT mentor terms trail blazing. This journey has been written into a book which I need funds to edit in preparation of publishing.
You can see the services that I offer on my website www.beahappymom.com

When I got married, my husband joined me in adding the Torah dimension to what I do. There have been two hurdles to overcome in making this dream a reality. One has been lack of understanding and recognition of the profession of occupational therapy, and the other has been funding. The lack of understanding has at times interfered with obtaining the necessary funding.

A few years ago, we began producing books that share important concepts of respecting others, increasing one's knowledge of Torah (the Bible) and improving one's health and well being. The aim of these books is to share these important concepts and to create products that will help us to generate the funds necessary to build a sustainable Torah and healing centre.
We have 4 books out thus far:

- ""Tuvia Finds His Freedom"" is a nature story for children, available in English and Hebrew (i.e. 2 books). This book was written to share some ideas of how easy it is to help a lost animal. In a world where the news is filled with acts of cruelty, we aim to help children to internalize the importance of showing kindness and respect to all of creation, including plants, animals and the environment, and from there to extend to other children and adults too.

- ""Parshah in Just Two Minutes!"" is a book of summaries of each Aliyah to the Torah (7 in total) for each weekly portion. The book is written to help the beginner-to-Torah get to know the most important stories and flow of Torah, while providing an invaluable summary / review for the Torah scholar.

- ""Healing Your Life Through Activity - An Occupational Therapist's Story"" is the first of several books to educate on the importance of having an active life of meaning and purpose. This book is written for the non-OT, assisting them to learn about the vast and incredible profession of occupational therapy. It is hoped that this book will help to overcome the hurdle of the limited understanding of the profession.

It might sound impressive that we have 4 books in print that we have published! Every detail involved in the process from idea to completed book has been carried out by ourselves.  However, we need your help to enhance the books, to cover expenses incurred from bringing them to print. We also require funds to market / promote these books in order to reach our readers and to continue producing further quality books.

""Tuvia Finds His Freedom"" is in need of a workbook to accompany it. In order to make this a reality we need to hire a good illustrator who can assist with certain drawings that I have struggled to draw effectively. Once this workbook is complete we will need to translate it into Hebrew as we did for the book itself. Later we hope to add other books - making this a series with different animals so that children can learn the importance of treating animals correctly and appropriately.

Having the package of book and workbook will enable us to begin offering workshops related to learning about the animals, and important concepts such as kindness to animals, nature and the environment.

""Parshah In Just Two Minutes!"" is currently undergoing a revision. The new version will have letters of approbation to support it and a number of improvements. We need your help to be able to devote the time to improving this book and then to market it effectively.

""Healing Your Life Through Activity - An Occupational Therapist's Story"" is also being improved. I am working on obtaining further letters to support the book - which requires mailing copies of the book often internationally. When running the previous crowd fundraiser, we did not bring in sufficient funds to have the book professionally edited. The book is currently being worked on to ensure that it is a top quality finished product. An important appendix has also been added. We need your help to complete the revisions, cover costs of mailing copies where necessary, translating the book into Hebrew and of course for effective marketing and promotion.

We are also in need of improving certain software and equipment e.g. our cameras and a video camera for educational videos or photographs to support our work, promote our work and to be used within further publications or in developing online courses.

The books and online courses are two income streams that we are developing in order to help for the centre to be sustainable. Another income stream is the renting out of our 59 bridal gowns. The bridal gowns actually form part of a larger service offered for new brides. As you can see in the video, the room for the bridal gowns is too small. Thus far every bride that has come to view our bridal gowns has complained about the lack of space. The limited space also prevents me from offering certain other services that I have developed. Without the income from renting the bridal gowns, we lack the funds to continue our service assisting orphan brides and grooms at the time they marry.
SOME OF THE SERVICES OF THE CENTRE:

The full vision of the centre has two divisions to it. The services offered on my website: www.beahappymom represent the women's division of this centre. These services are all structured to assist women to fulfill the important life roles of wife and mother. There are 4 main groupings to these services:
<ol>
• To assist Jewish women to reach the goal of becoming a wife
• To assist Jewish women to reach the goal of becoming a mother
• To assist Jewish women to reach the goal of becoming a happy mother, meaning that they will be happy in this role and fulfill it to the optimum
Certain services offered for children that assist with category 2 and 3.

These services can be viewed on my website. Services are both individual and in group and hence there is a need for treatment rooms for individual consultation and for group intervention. The needs for the treatment room for women differs to that necessary for children. An example of a group workshop is the one mentioned above helping children to understand why and how to respect and show kindness to our environment, plants, animals and then to extend this to people too. Two of our needs in order to offer these workshops is the workbook to accompany the book we have written and the suitable room for children to attend and participate. If we can meet our goal, we'd love for the centre to also have a beautiful garden and possibly even a pet corner as there are so many therapeutic benefits of nature.

Many of the services offered to women are trailblazing and these are some that I mentioned in the video I require funding in order to write up in professional journals. I have a list of at least 10  books to write and several courses to develop. The courses will be geared at teaching other occupational therapists the services that I have discovered the need for and developed.

To answer the question many are posing about the bridal gowns. In truth, we had a store as well. We have temporarily had to put the store on hold as we had to let go of all of our stock when moving back to Jerusalem, due to lack of space. Both the store and the bridal gowns aim to support our work to empower orphans and hopefully widows too. These two services require space to house them and are developed in order to fund the service to empower orphans. Yes, occupational therapy has a role to play in assisting orphans which is another area that I need to write up in more detail. As mentioned in the video, the goal is for the orphans to be independent in all areas of their life. One aspect of that is financial independence. As I mentioned in the video 1 in 3 children in Israel live below the poverty line. Orphans and widows are more at risk of poverty than those who come from a stable, supportive family.

A few areas of intervention suitable to orphans would include grief therapy, play therapy, improving self-esteem, improving self-confidence, developing appropriate support system. There are other areas too, depending on the unique need of each orphan or widow.

If I can reach my goal, some of the rooms in the centre will be geared to assist with jobs skills and job creation. I also aim for some rooms to offer short-term accommodation where necessary. I aim to write the reason for this in a blog post or two. It is too lengthy to add here.

As you can see, by assisting us to bring this centre into being, some of the assistance will also go towards the time necessary to write, edit and develop articles, books and courses that add to the profession of occupational therapy. For those who are puzzled, yes, the new model that I developed does include OT combined with Torah and is one of the books and courses that I am working on.

To answer another question before it is asked, the areas that I have developed apply to all. Many of the books, blog posts and products are applicable to all too. The reason that my centre is specific to Jewish women is due to specific needs which I explain in my book about OT and Torah.

We ask you to make a generous donation to assist in helping the world to benefit from the knowledge and skills that we have to share. Our focus is in spreading ideas and information to improve kindness, respect, truth, unity and peace. In addition to the publications, we have services, some of which are offered in person and some online, that need the appropriate venue to make this a reality.
The pie chart listed here shows a breakdown of how funds will be utilized. Any and all donations are very greatly appreciated.
Other Ways You Can Help

- Share this campaign on Facebook and receive a PDF version of a poem with a drawing by Shoshanah Shear. Please send me a capture or the link to where you have shared the campaign and I will email you the PDF
- Encourage  your friends to purchase a copy of Tuvia Finds His Freedom
- Purchase a copy of Tuvia Finds His Freedom in English or Hebrew or both
- Pre-purchase a copy of Parshah in Just Two Minutes! to receive the revised version
- Pre-purchase a copy of ""Healing Your Life Through Activity"" to receive the revised version
- Join our Author page on Facebook
- Join our Chessed Ve'Emet page on Facebook
- Join my Facebook group for my services to assist Jewish women in the role of wife and mother
- Interview us for your blog, podcast or radio program to help spread the word about our books and the centre that we are developing
- Book us for an inspirational talk virtually or in-person. Please be in touch for our fees for motivational talks and workshops
- Sign up to become an affiliate marketer of any, or all of our books.
- If you know of any companies that offer corporate sponsorship please let us know or share this campaign with them
- Visit our websites at www.lovingkindness.co and www.beahappymom.com
Thank you for your assistance. We look forward to sharing the progress and developments in this exciting venture.

column11: >This ultra-heated foam roller provides consistent heat and pressure for deep muscle therapy for pain relief and more.
column21: >Designed by Dr. Tony Rocklin, HotRock is the next evolution in foam-rolling. Through consistent high temperatures and precise deep tissue massage, using HotRock with your regular foam-rolling routine improves mobility, decreases pain and soreness, and assists in injury healing while speeding up recovery and relaxation.

With the perfect balance between comfort and pressure to reach tissues sore from prolonged sitting or intense physical activity, HotRock provides pain relief, increased mobility, and accelerated injury recovery with any physical therapy program.

column12: >Perfect for athletes, those with chronic pain, recovering from injury or surgery, or looking for relaxation and stress relief.
column13:
>

HotRock is designed to help people of all fitness levels to increase their range of movement, improve muscle recovery, decrease pain and all-around feel great!

In this short 50-second video, hear different users share about the experience with HotRock.

column1: <li><span style=""font-size: 12px
column2: >Scott Haskin — Former NBA Player — After getting ""toasty hot"", HotRock helps with the back and hamstrings.

column1: <li><span style=""font-size: 12px
column2: >Heather — Physical Therapy Patient — Living in a cold climate, this entices me to get out of bed and do some foam-rolling.

column1: <li><span style=""font-size: 12px
column2: >James — Physical Therapy Patient — It's a double win, I'm getting the heat and pressure on those points I need it most.

Our beta testers included several participants who put their bodies through intense physical effort every single day. We know if we could make their lives better with HotRock, then we created a spectacular at-home recovery tool.

column1: <li><span style=""font-size: 12px
column2: >Kate Long — Personal Trainer — ""This really helps get my day and warm-up started before I teach classes.""

column1: <li><span style=""font-size: 12px

column14: >By combining soothing thermotherapy with deep myofascial release, regular use with HotRock helps increase blood flow to joints and sore muscles for at-home relief and relaxation from intense workouts or working-from-home sessions.
column17:
>Providing consistent heat up to 175°F, using HotRock helps to increase blood flow to improve mobility, decrease pain and soreness, and speed up recovery.

Thermotherapy increases blood flow bringing in more oxygen and nutrients while eliminating metabolic waste and injury debris for faster and better healing, relaxation, and recovery. HotRock allows you to find the perfect temperature for comfort:

column1: <li><span style=""font-size:12px
column2: >Consistent High Heat — Unlike microwave-heated rollers that lose heat and can’t be regulated by the user, HotRock is the only advanced foam roller that heats up past 175° F in less than 4 minutes and stays that way.

column1: <li><span style=""font-size:12px
column2: >Advanced Heat Controls — Use the built-in LCD control panel to adjust the temperature for your every need: lower heat for sensitive body parts or increased heat on muscles and joints for deeper therapy.

column3: >HotRock's Massage and Myofascial Benefits
column4:

HOTROCK

Self-Heating Foam Rollerfor Rapid Recovery   This ultra-heated foam roller provides consistent heat and pressure for deep muscle therapy for pain relief and more.  Designed by Dr. Tony Rocklin, HotRock is the next evolution in foam-rolling. Through consistent high temperatures and precise deep tissue massage, using HotRock with your regular foam-rolling routine improves mobility, decreases pain and soreness, and assists in injury healing while speeding up recovery and relaxation.   At-Home Heated Muscle Recovery.
Able to Heat up to 175°F
HotRock's Enterprise SmartWire technology reaches maximum temperature within 4 minutes to provide fast, soothing thermotherapy benefits to increase blood flow, help reduce pain, and relieve stress.
Effective, Deep Self Massaging

With the perfect balance between comfort and pressure to reach tissues sore from prolonged sitting or intense physical activity, HotRock provides pain relief, increased mobility, and accelerated injury recovery with any physical therapy program.

Loaded With Extra Features   Real Reviews from HotRock Testers.Perfect for athletes, those with chronic pain, recovering from injury or surgery, or looking for relaxation and stress relief.HotRock is designed to help people of all fitness levels to increase their range of movement, improve muscle recovery, decrease pain and all-around feel great!  In this short 50-second video, hear different users share about the experience with HotRock.
Scott Haskin — Former NBA Player — After getting ""toasty hot"", HotRock helps with the back and hamstrings.
Heather — Physical Therapy Patient — Living in a cold climate, this entices me to get out of bed and do some foam-rolling.
James — Physical Therapy Patient — It's a double win, I'm getting the heat and pressure on those points I need it most.

Our beta testers included several participants who put their bodies through intense physical effort every single day. We know if we could make their lives better with HotRock, then we created a spectacular at-home recovery tool.
Landen Lucas — Pro Basketball Player — ""A whole new element to foam rolling, allowing me to do what I need to recover""
Kate Long — Personal Trainer — ""This really helps get my day and warm-up started before I teach classes.""
Jeremy Weinman — Competetive Triathlete— ""It's good to warm up and recovery, as it lets me flush out lactic acid""

<h3 style=""text-align: center
Short Summary
Did you know that the top 10 products in the OTC topical pain relief industry contain ingredients that are harmful?
There are two reasons for this:
1) Quality and safety regulations for cosmetics and skincare products in the U.S are low.
2) Cheap product ingredients make for larger profits.

These reasons give businesses a low barrier to entry into the topical pain relief industry. More importantly, the incentive to manufacture higher quality, eco-friendly products is not there. The end product suffers and benefits to the consumer are marginalized. That's why there are so many products with questionable contents flooding the pain relief marketplace.

Our brand is here because we saw a push from consumers for more natural, eco-friendly options for pain relief with no compromise on effectiveness. The push for better quality is already happening in the cosmetics industry and it is spilling into other skincare products.
Topical pain relief is not a new thing. Our vision for a higher industry standard is. We are raising the bar.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >Introducing Battle Balm®, the all-natural, 100% plant-based topical pain reliever.

column1: What makes us different?
We are not bringing you just another option for pain relief.
We are bringing you a BETTER option.
This is how:
1)  We source premium quality grown safe ingredients from all over the world.
2)  We incentivize farmers to grow crops without pesticides and soil damaging nutrients.
3)  We responsibly manufacture products with the goal of reducing carbon emissions throughout our entire system.
4)  We constantly research new and better technology to deliver unsurpassed quality with equal concern for sustainability and environmental impact.
5)  We are creating longevity in the industry through our core values: honesty, transparency, and responsibility.

Battle Balm was born out of an acupuncture clinic that specialized in natural pain management. We started with a team of caring medical practitioners with the greatest intention to help others. Now, with your support, we can help others on a much larger scale.
<h3>What We Need &amp

We are already a viable start-up company. Battle Balm products are currently being sold through our website and select offices, medical clinics, gyms, online and retail stores. We have a polished product that is far past the proof of concept stage. Battle Balm has also received many accolades from our customers, with statistics showing over 23% returning to purchase again. Below is the actual chart for sales in the past 5 years. (We removed the dollar value from the y-axis.)
We are not a high risk company anymore.
Our business outlook is positive and we will incrementally grab more and more market share. But this is not just about us.
It's about providing cleaner, greener, more sustainable solutions to improve our daily lives right now.

There are still so many people who haven't yet heard about Battle Balm. We want them to become conscious consumers like you. The sooner we can build our brand and broaden our reach, the larger the impact we make in reducing the industry's overall environmental footprint.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
Help us be the change we wish to see in the world.
Battle Balm is trying to secure funding from conscious investors like you to do 5 things:

1)  Procure medium scale production and automation equipment to meet growing demand for 2018. Incorporate more sustainable, environmentally friendly shipping, packing and operations equipment in our process. Implement methods to reduce carbon footprint and continue to do so as we grow.

2)  Increase warehouse inventory of raw materials by continuing to source/invest in healthy, ecologically beneficial farming practices. Build partner relationships with more farmers to facilitate mutually beneficial opportunities.
3)  Research ways to recycle or reduce waste from product manufacturing methods.
4)  Spread the word through targeted marketing and advertising campaigns about organic and natural pain relief.
5)  Prepare ourselves for the rapid growth we expect from our revolutionary product by hiring more individuals who care about people and the planet.

Hitting our goal is important to us because we understand that it takes extra time and effort to do things the right way. In the business world, that time and effort translates to additional upfront costs.
We'd love for you to be a part of something greater than ourselves, not just right now, but for our future on this planet.

If we don't reach our fundraising goal, all is not lost. We will be able to put the funds towards gathering a portion of the equipment needed to scale up. We would still focus on maximizing efficiency and minimizing our carbon footprint, but it would not be possible to implement immediately.
The Chance to Make an Impact

What if the biggest topical pain relief brand in the industry was sourcing completely natural and organic, 100% plant-based ingredients in an ecologically friendly, carbon neutral, sustainable way? We want to be that brand.
Battle Balm® is ready to be catapulted to the top. If we get there, we can change everything.
Help us help the world.
Battle Balm is Ready to Ship!

We are ready to ship out the best topical pain reliever in the world right to your door! This is not a prototype or an abstract product idea. Battle Balm is a market tested product that will exceed all your expectations!
Other Ways You Can Help
We would love for you to help us in any way possible. Here are a few ideas in case you can spare 5 minutes of your time for a good cause:
<ul>
<li>Be a fan! Follow us on social media! We are on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, &amp
• Tell others about the Battle Balm crowdfunding campaign. Share on social media.
• Leave us product reviews online. It helps others to learn more about Battle Balm.
• Add our cool stickers to your motorcycle, car, truck, airplane, or spaceship so others can see that we exist.
• Tell your physical therapist, doctor, acupuncturist, massage therapist, chiropractor, school, gym, athletic program, team, etc., to try Battle Balm.
Thanks for backing!

Meet TRUBlanket: A Weighted Blanket for Today’s Stressful World

Imagine a blanket that could give you the same benefits as a full body hug. 
Weighted blankets have been used by medical professionals for decades to encourage relaxation and reduce stress. Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation uses the body’s own natural systems and create a sense of calm and safety.

Now, you can experience the improved benefits of our superior quality weighted blanket for yourself!  TRUBlanket™ is an innovative option for those who find it difficult to fall asleep or need relief from stress and anxiety.

Many people have found that the power of Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation has been helpful in their search for stress reduction and sleep quality! Weighted blankets are heavy to give you that extra bit of pressure so you feel just right in your bed. Don’t be surprised when you begin to sleep deeper and wake up more refreshed.
Daily life is high-paced and stressful. When you can relax and unwind, you can rest easier. Your whole life is sweeter. Snuggling into a weighted blanket could be exactly what’s missing in your life!
Weighted blankets are highly regarded by medical experts. They have successfully been used in hospitals and in therapy for decades to support people who experience stress and sleep disturbances.
Please note: the weighted blanket is not intended to cure or treat any medical conditions, but it's a great support tool.

If You Feel Anxiety and Stress – 77% of Americans report feeling regular physical symptoms tied to stress. We’re always multi-tasking, checking our devices, and generally on the go. Even when we make time to disconnect and relax, we feel wired and sick. It affects our health in many ways, and this is a way to address the gravity of the situation.

Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation helps you to unwind and relax without the expense of a massage or a day at the spa. The feeling of a full body hug helps your body to relax and your mind to let go of some of the worries.

If You Can't Sleep - Snuggle up to your TRUBlanket™ and let your mind wander! If your body is comfortable, it's easier to relax. Our heavy weighted blanket is incredibly cozy and pleasant to sleep on. 90% of people who use a weighted blanket report improved sleep patterns. They fall asleep easier, and they sleep deeper. We can't say for sure that you'll experience the same benefits, but it's definitely a great way to support healthy sleeping patterns.

Other Times a Blanket Helps – Those with sensory integration issues, ADHD, autism, or simply normal everyday stress often enjoy to use a weighted blanket. A long ride in the car or over-stimulation can lead to a meltdown, but TRUBlanket™ can provide the comfort to help a child relax.  TRUBlanket is also a great option for those who deal with PTSD, OCD, and a number of other stress-related symptoms. Remember, this is not a cure or treatment, just an aid.
<div style=""text-align: center
<div style=""text-align: center
<div><div>
<div style=""text-align: center
<div style=""text-align: center
<div style=""text-align: center
<div style=""text-align: center
<div style=""text-align: center

The TRUBlanket™ is designed to be roughly 10% (or a little more) of a typical adult’s body weight. We didn’t stop at creating a blanket that is heavy. We found ways to masterfully craft the TRUBlanket™ truly to be the best weighted blanket out there. You’ll love snuggling under this blanket on the couch and in your bed!

First off: shifting weight and crunching sounds. Our unique stitching pattern keeps the weight distributed evenly and reduces noises. It’s anchored at extra points inside the cover, keeping the weight from bunching.
TRUBlanket™’s weight comes from clean polished glass beads instead of plastics that give off an odor and contain toxic chemicals. You can rest easy without worries.
Our blanket design also includes an ultra-soft 400 thread count, making the blanket smooth to the touch and very breathable. Your body will always be at the perfect temperature.
It’s covered with a luxuriously soft plush minky cover that zips up for your convenience.
We included a high-quality embroidery on the blanket with the word ""Happiness"". We believe there is power in words, and it's our wish for everyone that uses this blanket to exude joy and happiness!
Take action! Don’t let bad sleep and stress destroy your health - mitigate the risks instead. Get the sleep and relaxation you need and deserve – with TRU Blanket.

We live in high-paced, stressful times. We’re always on the go, without taking time for self-care. Our minds and bodies need to relax and recharge from the constant bombardment of busy daily life and negativity that we deal with. Sometimes it’s hard to stop and just breathe.
Picture the world outside melting away while you snuggle with your loved ones or pets. Read a good book, watch a funny movie. Relax and enjoy.

Hi, I’m Jason, founder of TRU Lite Bedding , a family-owned company that specializes in sleep and bedding products. We’re passionately committed helping families get great sleep, because that can affect every aspect of life. Getting good rest sets you up for healthy relationships, emotions, and physical well-being. 
I guess you could say the TRUBlanket™ is kind of a “family affair.” We discovered the benefits of weighted blankets while looking to help one of my sons, who struggles with anxiety. His symptoms got so bad that he only felt safe sleeping in our bedroom. After reading up on studies showing how the extra weight can help reduce the effects of anxiety, depression, PTSD, and other related mental health issues, we finally had hope for our son’s peace of mind. I’m delighted to say that it worked with the help of the weighted blanket, nutritional supplementation and emotional work!
Inspired by amazing changes we saw as the result of a weighted blanket, we set to work creating an improved design for the best weighted blanket out there. That’s how the TRUBlanket™ came to be. With your help, we hope to bring the sense of peace and well-being that we’ve experienced to the world.
• How much does shipping cost?
$20 per blanket to the continental US!
• Does the TRUBlanket get too hot?
We designed the TRUBlanket with 100% breathable materials. The outer shell is also easily removable for warmer months. This way, you are never too hot or too cold.
• Where can I find scientific proof about the TRUBlanket's benefits?
The TRUBlanket was designed by paying careful attention to the science backing Deep Touch Pressure Stimulation. You can find some of the scientific research at the links below:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15650465
http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/pdf/10.1300/J004...
https://www.somna.eu/wp-content/uploads/2015/06...
https://www.jscimedcentral.com/SleepMedicine/sl...
http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?doid=1518701.151...
• Dimensions of the TRUBlanket?
60’’ x 80’’  (152 x 203 cm) and weighs 15 pounds (6.8 kg).
• Is the TRUBlanket Washable?
Yes, both the inner layer and the outer shell are machine washable!
• Will there be multiple color options?
We are considering multiple color options, but these will not be available until after our Kickstarter campaign has concluded.
• Where is your product made and what do you do to ensure ethically sound production methods?
Our products are designed in the US, and sourced abroad. We work with trusted manufacturing partners who abide by strict labor laws.
• I get overheated with conventional blankets. How does this product work with heat distribution?
We designed the warm cover to be removable, this way during the warmer months you can stay cool.
• What is your return policy for the blankets once they've shipped?
Because of the extensive discount that we're providing on Kickstarter, we're unable to offer a refund or return policy at this time.
• When will the first batch of blankets ship?

We will have a small limited batch ready to go for the first supporters getting the “Break of Dawn Package” and these will ship immediately after funding for the project occurs. The next batch after this is slated to arrive in October to November.
• Does the TRUBlanket work effectively when shared between couples at night?
We suggest you purchase the “Partner Package”. That will allow you both to have your own TRU Blanket, and will save you over 200 dollars!
• Is it possible to change my order?
Yes, simply withdraw your original order, and make another pledge at the reward level you desire.
• Can you ship to Alaska or Hawaii?

Yes! All you need to do is enter an amount that is at least $45 per blanket over your pledge level. This is because the cost for shipping to Alaska and Hawaii is $65, instead of the $20 shipping to the contiguous US.
• I live in the US. Will I have to pay sales tax on my purchase?

If you live in certain states, including Arizona, California, Florida, Idaho, Indiana, Kentucky, Maryland, Nevada, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Wisconsin, and Washington you may be responsible for a sales tax based on your state’s specific tax law. This will be calculated and included in your total shipping cost at the conclusion of the campaign when we process your order.
","Meet TRUBlanket: A Weighted Blanket for Today’s Stressful World

Imagine a blanket that could give you the same benefits as a full body hug. Weighted blankets have been used by medical professionals for decades to encourage relaxation and reduce stress. Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation uses the body’s own natural systems and create a sense of calm and safety.

Now, you can experience the improved benefits of our superior quality weighted blanket for yourself!  TRUBlanket™ is an innovative option for those who find it difficult to fall asleep or need relief from stress and anxiety.

Many people have found that the power of Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation has been helpful in their search for stress reduction and sleep quality! Weighted blankets are heavy to give you that extra bit of pressure so you feel just right in your bed. Don’t be surprised when you begin to sleep deeper and wake up more refreshed.
Daily life is high-paced and stressful. When you can relax and unwind, you can rest easier. Your whole life is sweeter. Snuggling into a weighted blanket could be exactly what’s missing in your life!
Weighted blankets are highly regarded by medical experts. They have successfully been used in hospitals and in therapy for decades to support people who experience stress and sleep disturbances.
Please note: the weighted blanket is not intended to cure or treat any medical conditions, but it's a great support tool.

If You Feel Anxiety and Stress – 77% of Americans report feeling regular physical symptoms tied to stress. We’re always multi-tasking, checking our devices, and generally on the go. Even when we make time to disconnect and relax, we feel wired and sick. It affects our health in many ways, and this is a way to address the gravity of the situation.

Deep Pressure Touch Stimulation helps you to unwind and relax without the expense of a massage or a day at the spa. The feeling of a full body hug helps your body to relax and your mind to let go of some of the worries.

If You Can't Sleep - Snuggle up to your TRUBlanket™ and let your mind wander! If your body is comfortable, it's easier to relax. Our heavy weighted blanket is incredibly cozy and pleasant to sleep on. 90% of people who use a weighted blanket report improved sleep patterns. They fall asleep easier, and they sleep deeper. We can't say for sure that you'll experience the same benefits, but it's definitely a great way to support healthy sleeping patterns.

Other Times a Blanket Helps – Those with sensory integration issues, ADHD, autism, or simply normal everyday stress often enjoy to use a weighted blanket. A long ride in the car or over-stimulation can lead to a meltdown, but TRUBlanket™ can provide the comfort to help a child relax.  TRUBlanket is also a great option for those who deal with PTSD, OCD, and a number of other stress-related symptoms. Remember, this is not a cure or treatment, just an aid.

The TRUBlanket™ is designed to be roughly 10% (or a little more) of a typical adult’s body weight. We didn’t stop at creating a blanket that is heavy. We found ways to masterfully craft the TRUBlanket™ truly to be the best weighted blanket out there. You’ll love snuggling under this blanket on the couch and in your bed!

First off: shifting weight and crunching sounds. Our unique stitching pattern keeps the weight distributed evenly and reduces noises. It’s anchored at extra points inside the cover, keeping the weight from bunching.
TRUBlanket™’s weight comes from clean polished glass beads instead of plastics that give off an odor and contain toxic chemicals. You can rest easy without worries.
Our blanket design also includes an ultra-soft 400 thread count, making the blanket smooth to the touch and very breathable. Your body will always be at the perfect temperature.
It’s covered with a luxuriously soft plush minky cover that zips up for your convenience.
We included a high-quality embroidery on the blanket with the word ""Happiness"". We believe there is power in words, and it's our wish for everyone that uses this blanket to exude joy and happiness!
Take action! Don’t let bad sleep and stress destroy your health - mitigate the risks instead. Get the sleep and relaxation you need and deserve – with TRU Blanket.

We live in high-paced, stressful times. We’re always on the go, without taking time for self-care. Our minds and bodies need to relax and recharge from the constant bombardment of busy daily life and negativity that we deal with. Sometimes it’s hard to stop and just breathe.
Picture the world outside melting away while you snuggle with your loved ones or pets. Read a good book, watch a funny movie. Relax and enjoy.

Hi, I’m Jason, founder of TRU Lite Bedding , a family-owned company that specializes in sleep and bedding products. We’re passionately committed helping families get great sleep, because that can affect every aspect of life. Getting good rest sets you up for healthy relationships, emotions, and physical well-being. I guess you could say the TRUBlanket™ is kind of a “family affair.” We discovered the benefits of weighted blankets while looking to help one of my sons, who struggles with anxiety. His symptoms got so bad that he only felt safe sleeping in our bedroom. After reading up on studies showing how the extra weight can help reduce the effects of anxiety, depression, PTSD, and other related mental health issues, we finally had hope for our son’s peace of mind. I’m delighted to say that it worked with the help of the weighted blanket, nutritional supplementation and emotional work!Inspired by amazing changes we saw as the result of a weighted blanket, we set to work creating an improved design for the best weighted blanket out there. That’s how the TRUBlanket™ came to be. With your help, we hope to bring the sense of peace and well-being that we’ve experienced to the world.
How much does shipping cost?
$20 per blanket to the continental US!
Does the TRUBlanket get too hot?
We designed the TRUBlanket with 100% breathable materials. The outer shell is also easily removable for warmer months. This way, you are never too hot or too cold.
Where can I find scientific proof about the TRUBlanket's benefits?
The TRUBlanket was designed by paying careful attention to the science backing Deep Touch Pressure Stimulation. You can find some of the scientific research at the links below:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15650465
http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/pdf/10.1300/J004...
https://www.somna.eu/wp-content/uploads/2015/06...
https://www.jscimedcentral.com/SleepMedicine/sl...
http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?doid=1518701.151...
Dimensions of the TRUBlanket?
60’’ x 80’’  (152 x 203 cm) and weighs 15 pounds (6.8 kg).
Is the TRUBlanket Washable?
Yes, both the inner layer and the outer shell are machine washable!
Will there be multiple color options?
We are considering multiple color options, but these will not be available until after our Kickstarter campaign has concluded.
Where is your product made and what do you do to ensure ethically sound production methods?
Our products are designed in the US, and sourced abroad. We work with trusted manufacturing partners who abide by strict labor laws.
I get overheated with conventional blankets. How does this product work with heat distribution?
We designed the warm cover to be removable, this way during the warmer months you can stay cool.
What is your return policy for the blankets once they've shipped?
Because of the extensive discount that we're providing on Kickstarter, we're unable to offer a refund or return policy at this time.
When will the first batch of blankets ship?

We will have a small limited batch ready to go for the first supporters getting the “Break of Dawn Package” and these will ship immediately after funding for the project occurs. The next batch after this is slated to arrive in October to November.
Does the TRUBlanket work effectively when shared between couples at night?
We suggest you purchase the “Partner Package”. That will allow you both to have your own TRU Blanket, and will save you over 200 dollars!
Is it possible to change my order?
Yes, simply withdraw your original order, and make another pledge at the reward level you desire.
Can you ship to Alaska or Hawaii?

Yes! All you need to do is enter an amount that is at least $45 per blanket over your pledge level. This is because the cost for shipping to Alaska and Hawaii is $65, instead of the $20 shipping to the contiguous US.
I live in the US. Will I have to pay sales tax on my purchase?

If you live in certain states, including Arizona, California, Florida, Idaho, Indiana, Kentucky, Maryland, Nevada, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Wisconsin, and Washington you may be responsible for a sales tax based on your state’s specific tax law. column3:
>We are offering an innovative and high quality product. With our BootSki we have developed a construction that is compatible with all ski boots on the market while still offering the same degree of security as usual skis. It’s never been so easy to switch from regular skis into the new BootSki adventure. Let’s spice up a day in the slopes!
The BootSki also comes with a binding in multiple sizes which makes it a safe and simple attachment. There’s nothing like this one out there.
column5: >To see how easy it is click on the video below!

column2: >Meet the BootSki, let us show you how to get started
column6:
>

We offer four different sizes of the BootSki: Small, Medium, Large or X-Large. To find the right size for you, measure your ski boot according to the instructions in the video and choose the size according to the size chart below. With the binding option, you can fit your BootSki perfectly to your ski boot (as seen in the video).
column7:
>



We have done extensive testing of the material to find the right one for this purpose and to guarantee a high quality and safe product.


The advantage of using Bootski 
We want to share the freedom and diversity the BootSki offers and challenge people to explore new ways of downhill skiing.

With our simple, yet highly functional design, we believe that the BootSki will bring alpine skiing to a whole new level. It is a huge market to try to establish in, but we believe that people need variety in their skiing lives and are willing to explore new ideas. Once people will understand how useful and smooth our BootSki is, the good news will surely spread rapidly.
column8:
>
Help us to get this movement started and bring our creation to the slopes.
To get the production started, we need 45000 $ (these include costs for our equipment, the modling, etc.) To start off and compensate the initial costs, we need a pre-order of 1.500 BootSkis to start the production with our suppliers.
column9: >In order to get this movement started, we need your support to fulfill the minimum order quantity and pay for the equipment to start our production.

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/79RJLkqgUOs?autohide=1&amp

column2:
>How it all started 

Our story begins in 2001 in a small town called Ulricehamn in the south of Sweden. We wanted to find a new fun and more exciting way to use our little ski slope at home. So we took the matter into our own hands, went to a flea market, bought as many pairs of skis and ski boots as we could, cut off the tip of the skis and by that we reduced the base to the size of the ski boot. As simple as it may seem, the BootSki was born. 
What we created was the perfect illusion! 
It seemed as if we would race downhill without our skis strapped on. Our friends loved it and our very first BootSkis were sold.
It took 15 years for us to see the full potential of our creation and optimize it to the edition we proudly present today.
>BE PART OF THE MOVEMENT

column2: >How often do I have to charge the iite S1 toothbrush?

>iite S1 has a battery life of up to 60 days, when the toothbrush power gets down to 10%, the toothbrush will remind you to charge it. The charge lasts for about 60 days so it only needs to be fully charged 6 times in a year.
>How long can a brush head be used for?

>When the brush head is used for a long time, the surface of the brush will be bifurcated and the hardness is reduced due to fatigue. The cleaning power will be greatly reduced. Dentists recommend replacing the head brush every 3 months to obtain better cleaning effect.
>​Where can I buy replacement head brushes post-campaign?

>You will be able to buy head brushes online through our cooperate dental clinics, our website, and our amazon store. On top of that, we will have several distribution agents selling brushheads in various countries.

>Sonic electric toothbrushes, also known as sound wave electric toothbrushes, use magnetic levitation motors as a power source. Driven by the toothbrush head in accordance with high frequency vibration to achieve a better brushing experience than mechanical and automatic toothbrushes.
>What are the advantages of a sonic toothbrush compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes?
>a. Sonic toothbrushes clean more thoroughly and will whiten your teeth in the long-term.

>Many people do not brush their teeth thoroughly that results in lot of bacteria and food compiling on the tooth surface. Over time that will create plaque and form calculus which can be hard to remove. Sonic toothbrushes have high-speed vibration that completely clean the tooth surface so they effectively remove plaque, preventing the production of calculus and ensuring your teeth are healthier. In addition, regular use of sonic toothbrushes can gradually whiten the teeth whereas manual and automatic toothbrushes are not very effective on in-depth clearing and whitening.
>b. Sonic toothbrushes are safer and have less wear on teeth than manual and automatic toothbrushes.

>Sonic toothbrushes is designed to break the toothpaste into tiny bubbles with the help of high speed vibration. It drives the water to remove the residues stuck between teeth. Many number of studies have shown that sonic toothbrushes are safer than manual toothbrushes because they do not harm the soft tissues and gums inside the mouth.
>c. Reduce bleeding gums and prevents variety of oral diseases

>Exports reports that bleeding gums is not caused by brushing too hard but mostly due to not brushing properly. Harmful bacteria near the gums generates germs which simulates gums bleeding. Sonic toothbrushes compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes can remove more than 38% of the bacteria on the teeth and reduce the bleeding rate of the gums by 60%.
>What advantages does the sonic electric toothbrush have compared to a rotary electric toothbrush?

>Sonic electric toothbrushes clean the surface of the teeth and at the same time drives the flow of water to wash away any food residue stuck on the blind area within the mouth while rotary electric toothbrushes are not suited for the people with sensitive teeth, their motor mainly rely on the brush and tooth surface friction clean and make unnecessary noise.

column1: ","Kids love iite S1 toothbrush and enjoy to brush their teeth
1. Introduction of iite S1 Smart Sonic Toothbrush.

iite S1 smart sonic toothbrush for kids is the World's 1st smart toothbrush which can teach kids to brush their teeth in correct ways. iite S1 is also the 1st smart toothbrush which can collect kids teeth brushing data for parents and dentists purpose. In addition, iite S1 smart sonic toothbrush provides funny game/teaching systems to attract kids on toothbrushing.
New Mom interview for iite S1 Smart  Sonic Toothbrush

1st Smart Toothbrush Teaching Kids How to Brush Their Teeth
Safe Vibration Frequency (15,000 times/min)
Special Soft Food Grade Brush Head Design
Teeth Brushing Data Will be Recorded For Parents and Dentist Purpose
Task Setting and Reward System
Extra Long Brushing Time
Wireless Charging Technology

Toothbrush unbox video

How to install iite S1 App
All the data collected via S1 toothbrush can be used as kid’s dental record and share with dentist or other families online

3. Special Designed BrushheadEquipped with the special food grade brush head, the iite S1 becomes the only toothbrush in the market that can combine efficiency and safety together to better protect the oral health of kids. Bristles on brushhead are made by soft Dupon Nylon material, to form a smile face on brushhead, And iite will provide more new cartoon figures brushhead at the end of this year.
4. Safe Vibration Frequency

The iite S1 toothbrush is the first kid’s sonic toothbrush designed with safe vibration frequency (15000/min-dentist expert suggested frequency safe for kids) specialized to protect the sensitive gingival tissues of kids.
5. Wireless Charging Technology
iite S1 smart tooth brush for kids comes with intelligent wireless charging technology. The charging cradle and toothbrush can be separated when the brush is in use.
6. Extra Long Brushing Time

There is a 750mAh high capacity rechargeable battery in the S1 tooth brush which provide over 240 minutes brushing time with one single charge. So S1 tooth brush can provide over 2 month regular brushing time without a re-charge.
7. Teaching and 3D AR Game System​
iite S1 toothbrush teaching game can help kids to learn how to brush their teeth correctly. This funny cartoon game system can attract kids' attention on teeth brushing.
AR 3D fighting game cards are perfect rewards for kids, and they also teach children why they should brush their teeth correctly.
8. Comparison with Major Brand Kids Sonic Toothbrush
All major brands kids sonic/electric toothbrush on the market cannot protect the oral health of kids. Please check this comparative form
9. Recommended by Dentists and Dental Associations

Several dentist clinics and dental association units set a high value on iite S1 toothbrush. They will recommend iite S1 toothbrush to their patients. Also, San Francisco Dental association will cooperate with Ymax inc on kindergarten kids oral health program. iite S1 toothbrush will be used in this program to increase kids oral health levels.
Ymax Inc is providing technology and customer support to many dentists and associations, include:
1. Total Care dental clinic
2. San Francisco Dental Association
3. San Gabriel Dental Association
And many more!
10. Timeline for iite S1 Smart Sonic Toothbrush
11. Featured In...
12. Our Team Members
13. FAQ
How often do I have to charge the iite S1 toothbrush?

iite S1 has a battery life of up to 60 days, when the toothbrush power gets down to 10%, the toothbrush will remind you to charge it. The charge lasts for about 60 days so it only needs to be fully charged 6 times in a year.
How long can a brush head be used for?

When the brush head is used for a long time, the surface of the brush will be bifurcated and the hardness is reduced due to fatigue. The cleaning power will be greatly reduced. Dentists recommend replacing the head brush every 3 months to obtain better cleaning effect.
​Where can I buy replacement head brushes post-campaign?

You will be able to buy head brushes online through our cooperate dental clinics, our website, and our amazon store. On top of that, we will have several distribution agents selling brushheads in various countries.
What is a sonic electric toothbrush?

Sonic electric toothbrushes, also known as sound wave electric toothbrushes, use magnetic levitation motors as a power source. Driven by the toothbrush head in accordance with high frequency vibration to achieve a better brushing experience than mechanical and automatic toothbrushes.
What are the advantages of a sonic toothbrush compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes?
Sonic toothbrushes have the following advantages:
a. Sonic toothbrushes clean more thoroughly and will whiten your teeth in the long-term.

Many people do not brush their teeth thoroughly that results in lot of bacteria and food compiling on the tooth surface. Over time that will create plaque and form calculus which can be hard to remove. Sonic toothbrushes have high-speed vibration that completely clean the tooth surface so they effectively remove plaque, preventing the production of calculus and ensuring your teeth are healthier. In addition, regular use of sonic toothbrushes can gradually whiten the teeth whereas manual and automatic toothbrushes are not very effective on in-depth clearing and whitening.
b. Sonic toothbrushes are safer and have less wear on teeth than manual and automatic toothbrushes.

Sonic toothbrushes is designed to break the toothpaste into tiny bubbles with the help of high speed vibration. It drives the water to remove the residues stuck between teeth. Many number of studies have shown that sonic toothbrushes are safer than manual toothbrushes because they do not harm the soft tissues and gums inside the mouth.
c. Reduce bleeding gums and prevents variety of oral diseases

Exports reports that bleeding gums is not caused by brushing too hard but mostly due to not brushing properly. Harmful bacteria near the gums generates germs which simulates gums bleeding. Sonic toothbrushes compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes can remove more than 38% of the bacteria on the teeth and reduce the bleeding rate of the gums by 60%.
What advantages does the sonic electric toothbrush have compared to a rotary electric toothbrush?

Sonic electric toothbrushes clean the surface of the teeth and at the same time drives the flow of water to wash away any food residue stuck on the blind area within the mouth while rotary electric toothbrushes are not suited for the people with sensitive teeth, their motor mainly rely on the brush and tooth surface friction clean and make unnecessary noise.",25.0,9,"2 Campaigns
