Our hearts are drenched in bitter sweet joy when we think about our boys.

We have two beautiful boys Aidan (8 years) and Kaden (8 months). Our youngest son Kaden came into the world with a lot of difficulty breathing and was admitted to NICU (Neo-intensive Care Unit) after birth. This was the beginning of the challenging times to come. A few months ago Kaden has been diagnosed with a rare genetic chromosomal deletion on (chromosome 2 - 2q 24.1-24.3q)
column2: there are about 20 known cases in the world. It had been determined that our son is missing 37 genes in total. Specialists know what only 2 of the 37 genes do. As a result of the genetic deletion Kaden has what is known as Central Hypotonia (low muscle tone), global developmental delay, risk for epileptic seizures and other risks that are unknown at this time. Kaden also has Auditory Neuropathy Spectrum disorder which is a rare hearing loss disorder, it can include difficulty comprehending spoken language due to the auditory nerve not being functional. We recently learned that Kaden is not a candidate for a cochlear implant which was very difficult to hear however he is an Auditory Brainstem Implant candidate which is a difficult surgery offered outside of Canada (in Italy) that comes with risks and a very high cost.

column1: <div>

We discovered around 2 months of age that Kaden was not able to hold his head up.  We have since been working tirelessly with him to improve his condition. At 9 months of age the physical capabilities of holding up his head and body are that of a 3 month old baby. Kaden is currently seeing many specialists
column2: Neurologist, Optometrist, ENT specialist (Ear, Nose and Throat), Genetic specialist, Audiologist, Speech therapist, Occupational therapist, Physiotherapist. Despite his difficulties Kaden is a beautiful, happy and easy going baby boy. He is at the age where in order for him to learn and achieve as much as possible he needs to get help now while his brain is still adaptable to learning new tasks and make new neuronal connections. The therapy he needs has to be intense and ongoing in order for him to progress and not regress
column3: Kaden's physiotherapy is only on bi-weekly basis for two months at a time with 6-8 weeks off in between. He gets to see a physiotherapist only 4 times within two months.

column1: We are here today to ask for your help. We are eager to help our son and need to do whatever it takes to help him learn to sit, stand, walk, run, hear and talk. Kaden needs to grow and learn to become self-reliant.

This is possible, though it will take a lot of funds in order to receive the medical intervention that he desperately needs. With your contributions we will be able to take Kaden to a very specialized physiotherapy (which is currently not covered through the government) to get him the adequate intensive therapy that he needs. For example CME Therapy (Cuevas Medek Exercise Program) is an excellent specialized form of physiotherapy which provokes natural instinct and teaches children like Kaden to walk and become self-reliant. Intensive therapy like this costs $300 dollars per day. This intensive therapy is done twice per day and 5 days per week. This is just one of the expenses for Kaden, not to mention eye glasses, hearing aids, possibility of brain stem surgery, special baby formula that Kaden needs due to his cow milk protein and soy milk protein intolerance.
What We Need

Dear Friends, we have made a difficult decision to go forward and ask you for financial help. We need to be able to afford CME intensive physiotherapy for Kaden on an ongoing basis which costs $300 per day at five days per week.  Kaden got his first pair of glasses because he is far sighted and cannot see well up close, he will eventually need new glasses every few months as he is a growing baby. His first pair of glasses cost $320. We were able to get him hearing aids which cost us $1650 + new ear moulds every couple of weeks to a month which are $160 for both ears.  These costs are ongoing and accumulate very quickly. In our desperate attempt to help our son we ask you to help us make these interventions possible for him. Every bit contributed will make a difference for Kaden.

We know we are not the only parents who are going through this so with any excess contributions we get to help Kaden we would like to pay a portion of it forward as our way of saying thank you for helping us. Funds will go to other babies and their families who need help just like we do. Many families come to Toronto's Sick Kids Hospital from all over the world with similar challenges to improve their health, whether it is hearing, sight, or lifesaving surgery. For example giving a child hearing aids and enabling a child to hear for the first time is heartwarming, life changing experience for the child and their family. The investment in Kaden's hearing aids had a significant impact on our financial situation so being able to pay it forward (if even a little) and help others would be an honour.  We have made small but meaningful contributions to Sick Kids in hopes of being there for a child and family who need it the most.
Today we are doing what is best for our baby boy, we are asking you to make a financial contribution to Kaden's Fund.
The Impact
Being able to do this for our son brings hope for a better future for Kaden
column2: there is nothing a mother and father wouldn't do for their kids! The ability to transform Kaden's life and watch it as it happens is the greatest joy to us. There are no words to describe the happiness Kaden has brought to us, we are learning so much from this little guy.

column1: Please help change our baby's life and his future. Kaden deserves a fair chance at life as it should be.  He will benefit tremendously by receiving the intervention he desperately needs.
Other Ways You Can Help
We have faith that Kaden will get the help that he needs through your contributions which will allow us to provide the therapies and devices our baby desperately needs.
Please pray for Kaden as we believe he needs that too. We pray for him every day and know that if you pray for our son it can make a world of difference for him.
Please share our story with your friends and family and let them know the help we need today.
Thank you for all of your contributions, it means the world to us.
Aida, Len, Aidan &
","Our hearts are drenched in bitter sweet joy when we think about our boys.

We have two beautiful boys Aidan (8 years) and Kaden (8 months). Our youngest son Kaden came into the world with a lot of difficulty breathing and was admitted to NICU (Neo-intensive Care Unit) after birth. This was the beginning of the challenging times to come. A few months ago Kaden has been diagnosed with a rare genetic chromosomal deletion on (chromosome 2 - 2q 24.1-24.3q)
column2: there are about 20 known cases in the world. It had been determined that our son is missing 37 genes in total. Specialists know what only 2 of the 37 genes do. As a result of the genetic deletion Kaden has what is known as Central Hypotonia (low muscle tone), global developmental delay, risk for epileptic seizures and other risks that are unknown at this time. Kaden also has Auditory Neuropathy Spectrum disorder which is a rare hearing loss disorder, it can include difficulty comprehending spoken language due to the auditory nerve not being functional. We recently learned that Kaden is not a candidate for a cochlear implant which was very difficult to hear however he is an Auditory Brainstem Implant candidate which is a difficult surgery offered outside of Canada (in Italy) that comes with risks and a very high cost.

column1: We discovered around 2 months of age that Kaden was not able to hold his head up.  We have since been working tirelessly with him to improve his condition. At 9 months of age the physical capabilities of holding up his head and body are that of a 3 month old baby. Kaden is currently seeing many specialists
column2: Neurologist, Optometrist, ENT specialist (Ear, Nose and Throat), Genetic specialist, Audiologist, Speech therapist, Occupational therapist, Physiotherapist. Despite his difficulties Kaden is a beautiful, happy and easy going baby boy. He is at the age where in order for him to learn and achieve as much as possible he needs to get help now while his brain is still adaptable to learning new tasks and make new neuronal connections. The therapy he needs has to be intense and ongoing in order for him to progress and not regress
column3: Kaden's physiotherapy is only on bi-weekly basis for two months at a time with 6-8 weeks off in between. He gets to see a physiotherapist only 4 times within two months.

column1: We are here today to ask for your help. We are eager to help our son and need to do whatever it takes to help him learn to sit, stand, walk, run, hear and talk. Kaden needs to grow and learn to become self-reliant.

This is possible, though it will take a lot of funds in order to receive the medical intervention that he desperately needs. With your contributions we will be able to take Kaden to a very specialized physiotherapy (which is currently not covered through the government) to get him the adequate intensive therapy that he needs. For example CME Therapy (Cuevas Medek Exercise Program) is an excellent specialized form of physiotherapy which provokes natural instinct and teaches children like Kaden to walk and become self-reliant. Intensive therapy like this costs $300 dollars per day. This intensive therapy is done twice per day and 5 days per week. This is just one of the expenses for Kaden, not to mention eye glasses, hearing aids, possibility of brain stem surgery, special baby formula that Kaden needs due to his cow milk protein and soy milk protein intolerance.
What We Need

Dear Friends, we have made a difficult decision to go forward and ask you for financial help. We need to be able to afford CME intensive physiotherapy for Kaden on an ongoing basis which costs $300 per day at five days per week.  Kaden got his first pair of glasses because he is far sighted and cannot see well up close, he will eventually need new glasses every few months as he is a growing baby. His first pair of glasses cost $320. Taekwondo is my Passion: As a member of the Trinidad and Tobago National Taekwondo Team, I have practiced the beautiful sport for the past 8 years, obtaining my black belt at the prestigious Howard University Taekwondo Club, the home of many World and Olympic Champions alike. My journey has so far been very rewarding and successful: garnering numerous competition medals from the National Taekwondo Championships, intercollegiate circuit (internationally) and at the World Action Taekwondo Association (W.A.TA.) Open, as well as my most recent experience representing the Red, Black &
column2:
White at the 2013 World Taekwondo Championships in Mexico. 

As a 2016 Olympic Hopeful, my dream and goal is to proudly represent Trinidad and Tobago at these Games. The current system for Taekwondo Athletes in this country requires the athlete to be either self-funded or secure sponsorship. Additionally, a Taekwondo athlete’s International Ranking is the key factor to determining candidacy for the 2016 Olympics. For me to achieve my 2016 Olympic dream, I have to compete in as many of these high level international tournaments as possible. This is very costly, and is another reason why sponsorship is very critical.

My most recent achievement is that of being selected to represent our country at the prestigious and elite 2014 WTF-KHU Taekwondo Program at Kyung Hee University, Korea
column3:
a program which is only available to a total of sixty (60) athletes globally. The aim of the course is not only to improve my form as an internationally competitive Taekwondo athlete, but to help further the development of the art-form in Trinidad and Tobago. Whilst the International Taekwondo Academy has been gracious to cover my accommodation and cost of living, there is a great need for assistance to secure the price of the return airfare: US $2,500.

Thank you so much for your interest. Anyone who knows me can speak for my dedication to achieving excellence in the sport. However, if you do not know me feel free to ask any questions or visit my page to get updates on my journey to Rio 2016.

https://www.facebook.com/edsonbreedytkd

Short Summary

Your doctors and nurses wash their hands, wear gloves, sometimes wear a mask, and cover or seal many of the instruments they use to provide you with healthcare. But why are stethoscopes not included?

We aim to solve that problem.

Stethoscopes should not be a cause of the spread of disease by healthcare providers. ZeroScope is a one-use and easily applied device that attaches to the drum of a stethoscope and provides immediate and complete barrier defense between the instrument and the patient receiving care.

We're looking to raise the money needed to help us launch ZeroScope as a cost effective and ubiquitous device to solve the problem of hospital acquired infections that lead to more costly treatments or even death.
• Invented by a practicing Emergency Room Physician
• Passionate team focused on eliminating the wholly unnecessary transmission of disease by medical instruments such as the stethoscope
• ZeroScope has the potential to save both lives and money, and solves an immediate problem of barrier defense facing all healthcare practitioners who use stethoscopes.

ZeroScope is a novel, unique and user effective method of providing the type of patient protection we all deserve in 2014.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We need the additional funds to support our ""boot-strapped"" manufacturing of the devices. We've paid for the product design, testing, engineering and molding costs up to this point. Now, we're ready to roll ZeroScope into mass production in order to start saving lives and money.

column1: • The $12,000 we're seeking will allow us to continue to drive the price down on the device to under $0.20. Currently, the price is around $1 a device for our costs. That price needs to be lower in order to reach more patients. The money will go directly towards streamlining the expensive manufacturing, packaging, and shipping processes that we've already set up and create more efficiency for delivery to hospitals and clinics around the United States.

• As an example of how ZeroScope can change the healthcare industry, we're initially sending out packs based on donor levels to two regional burn centers. These burn centers treat many patients each year. Burns are some of the most devastating medical emergencies, and ZeroScope can save lives and costs by helping to prevent the spread of hospital acquired infections (a common problem in burn centers).

• Even if we don't reach our total goal, whatever we raise will go to the streamlining of the manufacturing, packaging, and shipping process to make ZeroScope more affordable and ubiquitous in our country's healthcare process. We believe in this product and know it can and will save lives.

The Impact

The stethoscope is the universal symbol of the healthcare professional
column2: technician, paramedic, nurse, and physician. Despite manufacture recommendations, routine sterilization between patients is nearly 100% ignored and even ineffective. Virulent strains are resistant to common methods of cleansing. Recent studies have shown stethoscopes to have greater than 90% contamination rates and nearly 25% with virulent strains of MRSA, VRE, C. difficile, Influenza, and Norovirus, and others.

column1: • ZeroScope is a novel and unique approach to stop these infections from spreading. We need your help to do that.
• We have a dedicated and passionate team ready to make ZeroScope and barrier protection more widespread in our healthcare landscape.
• Invented and led by an Emergency Room Physician with first hand knowledge of how important barrier protection can be for patient care, ZeroScope is ready to save lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money, there are still ways you can help spread the word about ZeroScope:
• You can use the sharing tools here on IndieGoGo to spread the word about ZeroScope to your social networks.
• Please visit our site at http://zeroscope.net and learn more about the device as well as barrier protection research.
<li>Feel free to email us at <a href=""https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&amp
column4: to=contact@zeroscope.net"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">contact@zeroscope.net and let us know if you have any questions!

Summary
Hi there.

My name's Chris. I write a blog and sometimes I make music. I thank my mom for that and for so many other things. Sadly, she passed away a couple of days ago, sooner than expected, leaving my dad with a lot more expenses than anticipated. Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS, a.k.a. Lou Gehrig's Disease) took her life at age 56.

I'm trying to raise funds to help my dad pay for the funeral expenses. My mom had a life insurance policy, but the cost is going to leave him struggling. Your generous financial support would mean the world to me, my dad, and to the rest of my family.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp

My mom passed away much sooner than anyone expected. We made funeral arrangements as a family, and we were very conservative. But because she died outside of her birth state, the costs are high. (Who knew it would cost so much to have a funeral home ship remains to another state?!) That said, the funeral expenses total roughly $12,000. Here's the breakdown:
<ul>
• Casket: $2995
• One day of visitation: $750
• Guest registration package: $100
• Forwarding of remains to another funeral home: $2550
• Cost of flight to transport remains: $600
• Air shipping container for casket: $200
• Home state funeral home receiving and services: $3050
• Grave site opening and closing: $1120
• Six copies of death certificate: $66
• Misc. (food, fuel to drive to home state, etc.): $500
• Clergy services: $0 (I couldn't talk her into accepting payment.)
• Approximate Total: $11,931

The Perks: If you want, I will autograph and mail you a copy of your favorite blog post, write a blog post on the subject of your choice, send you some homemade soap, even record a cover song for you! I'll even make you a personalized video. Whatever! All for my dad in honor of my mom!

Every little bit helps! I don't necessarily expect to reach $12,000, but I told my dad I could raise at least $3000. Everything after that helps that much more. If by some miracle we raise the entire $12k, all funds raised beyond the cost of the funeral-related expenses will be donated to the ALS Association.
<div>
The Impact

My dad has given up so much to be able to help my mom with her illness, and he's done so graciously, without complaint. Her physical decline has been an emotional, physical, and financial burden on him. He had to quit his job, and he took an early payment on his pension (at a high penalty) to pay for hospital bills and accessibility equipment needed for my mom during her deterioration, including a used, handicap accessible van. The van alone cost $25,000. Those pension funds are used up.
Any financial support my dad receives right now will help ease the burden and soften the blow of having to worry about how he's going to make ends meet. You can help give him some room to breathe.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Sharing is Caring!

I understand if you're unable to help financially. Everyone has their own burdens to bear. But whether you can contribute a lot, a little, or none, I humbly ask that you please share this campaign with others. Here are some ways to share and care:
<ul>
• Share on Facebook
• Tweet on Twitter
• Blog about it
• Tell a story about your own mom
• Raise awareness about ALS
• Pray, send love and light, hold us in your thoughts
• Hug your kids
• Call your mom
In whatever way(s) you see fit to help, you have my sincerest gratitude. You make this world a better place.

Thank you, thank you, thank you.

column8: >Niraxx delivers unique wavelengths of Near-Infrared Light based on patent-pending technology.  Be among the first to get access to this ground-breaking scientific discovery.

column1: Increase Brain Power And Performance With Just 20-40 Minutes, 2X Per Week

column1:
From Niraxx Co-Founder and Low-Level Light Therapy
Technology Pioneer, Dr. Paolo Cassano
column2:
>

""At Mass. General, Paolo Cassano... is working on one of several pilot studies nationwide of transcranial infrared light therapy [which is] believed to decrease inflammation and oxidative stress in the brain as well as increase the formation of neurons.""

""Cassano thinks light therapy could provide a groundbreaking new tool for depression treatment — one that is affordable, without side effects and more immediate than medication.""

""New research at Massachusetts General Hospital is showing that it may be able to treat severe depression with the use of specialized light and without medication.""

Exposure to a light that isn’t visible to the naked eye may be the next breakthrough treatment for depression. Massachusetts General Hospital psychiatrist Paolo Cassano, MD, PhD, and other researchers at MGH and elsewhere, are seeing encouraging results in studies of near-infrared light—the light closest on the spectrum to visible light.

Experts believe one cause of depression may be a disorder of brain metabolism — low brain energy. The infrared light stimulates brain cells (neurons) to produce energy so the brain can carry out its activities at a normal level.      

 

 

The technologies being studied in these clinical trials are not yet approved by any national regulatory body for the treatment of medical conditions and are presently only for the enhancement of general wellness and mental acuity.
column5:
>

""When I need to wake up early I use Niraxx in the 40Hz mode to help me prepare for the long day ahead"" - Guillherme Panno
column6:

*Individial results may vary.

","Find focus, re-energize & perform your best with this easy self-care solution.Niraxx delivers unique wavelengths of Near-Infrared Light based on patent-pending technology.  Be among the first to get access to this ground-breaking scientific discovery.

column1: Increase Brain Power And Performance With Just 20-40 Minutes, 2X Per WeekInduce either a calming effect with Alpha Wave pulses, or an energizing effect with Gamma Wave pulses depending on the benefit you're looking for.  How Does The Near Infrared Light Method Work?
Brainwaves, Before & After

From Niraxx Co-Founder and Low-Level Light TherapyTechnology Pioneer, Dr. Paolo Cassano""At Mass. General, Paolo Cassano... is working on one of several pilot studies nationwide of transcranial infrared light therapy [which is] believed to decrease inflammation and oxidative stress in the brain as well as increase the formation of neurons.""""Cassano thinks light therapy could provide a groundbreaking new tool for depression treatment — one that is affordable, without side effects and more immediate than medication.""""New research at Massachusetts General Hospital is showing that it may be able to treat severe depression with the use of specialized light and without medication.""Exposure to a light that isn’t visible to the naked eye may be the next breakthrough treatment for depression. Massachusetts General Hospital psychiatrist Paolo Cassano, MD, PhD, and other researchers at MGH and elsewhere, are seeing encouraging results in studies of near-infrared light—the light closest on the spectrum to visible light.Experts believe one cause of depression may be a disorder of brain metabolism — low brain energy. The infrared light stimulates brain cells (neurons) to produce energy so the brain can carry out its activities at a normal level.        The technologies being studied in these clinical trials are not yet approved by any national regulatory body for the treatment of medical conditions and are presently only for the enhancement of general wellness and mental acuity. Real Users, Real Results""When I need to wake up early I use Niraxx in the 40Hz mode to help me prepare for the long day ahead"" - Guillherme Panno""I'm a college student... I can stay focused all day to deal with all the work I'm doing... it keeps me feeling energized and really refreshed"" - Nicole Drotring""I woke up at 5:30 for a half marathon training run. While I was getting ready, I put this on for about 10 minutes. My run was terrific"" - Jerry Ahern""I used Niraxx at the 10Hz level... it prepared me for going to bed and I had no trouble falling asleep!"" - Natalia Guimaraes*Individial results may vary.

Backed By The Latest Research  At Top Institutions Natural, Safe and Non-Invasive Stress ReliefOur bodies respond positively to natural light, such as the light from the sun, which is 30% near-infrared light. Niraxx harnesses the body's natural, healthy response.     Included With Your Niraxx Pre-Order  The Science Behind Near-Infrared Light TherapyLEDs integrated into the headband deliver light therapy to the cells, increasing mitochondrial activity and ATP levels and overall energy to keep the body healthy.    Research AffiliationThis technology is developed and licensed to Niraxx by the Massachusetts General Hospital. Niraxx Original ResearchCLINICAL STUDYCASE STUDYREVIEWSECONDARY ANALYSISORIGINAL RESEARCH See Niraxx in Action  A Human-Centered Design PhilosophyThe Niraxx Smart Headband successfully combines wellness technology and easy-to-wear apparel design. Our device eliminates the cold, hard materials usually associated with the clinical aspects of traditional devices.Niraxx provides our users with health and wellness, no matter any social stigmas.Thanks to our engineers' efforts, the device will easily blend into your environment and become a part of your everyday life.  Technical Specifications

Brief description and some background:

Hello again. My name is Ricardo Villamizar.
A month ago I decided to start a campaing of knitting one wool cap per day, and give them to cancer patients by the end of the month.
The campaign was successful: I made the caps and I was able to donate them. But the most important gifts for me were the friends I made
column2: the courage, hope, and happiness of the cancer patients, and learning from the people who help their neighbours.

column1: This month I want to replicate the campaign. I hope this time more people get involved and help me to reach the goal:

column2: >""Bringing happiness, hope and affection, one hat per day"".

column1: • For this project I need less than $300! Most of the money is needed for buying new wool. Some is used to print new ""bussiness"" cards, letters and photocopying. I need a very small part for transportation and per diem. (If I ask for $500 is only because that amount is the lower limit here on IndieGoGo).

• If you are so kind to give  more than $300, I can make more caps, because another group of voluntaries (who work at another hospital) is also interested in my campaign. I will post news and updates about this new group, as soon as I get more feedback from them.
And you get:
<ul><li>This time I decided to knit 5 sheep wool caps as rewards, with the same pattern and appearance of the other 20 caps. They will also be double-sided
column2: will have the same size and thermal insulation. The colors will vary, so everybody will be happy. If the rewards are not claimed by the end of the month, they will be donated as well.

column1: <span style=""line-height: 30px
Specially, to the president of the ""Oncological Patients Association"", Mrs. Martha de Padrón, and all the collaborators who guided, introduced and helped me to carry out the donation.
And to our beloved friend in Bogotá: Amparo Díaz Uribe, inspiration for this campaing, who is fighting hard against cancer. Estamos contigo en pensamiento, palabra y acción.
<span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)

The previous campaign was a wonderful experience: I learned a lot and now I deeply appreciate the work of the voluntaries. Above all, the resolution, happiness and hope of the cancer patients is the most inspiring stimulus for me to keep on knitting.
You can also help a lot during this new campaign, just by sharing it on your social media.
Thanks in advance.
","Brief description and some background: Hello again. My name is Ricardo Villamizar.
A month ago I decided to start a campaing of knitting one wool cap per day, and give them to cancer patients by the end of the month.
The campaign was successful: I made the caps and I was able to donate them. But the most important gifts for me were the friends I made
column2: the courage, hope, and happiness of the cancer patients, and learning from the people who help their neighbours.

column1: This month I want to replicate the campaign. I hope this time more people get involved and help me to reach the goal:
Bringing happiness, hope and affection, one hat per day"".
I just need:

For this project I need less than $300! Most of the money is needed for buying new wool. Some is used to print new ""bussiness"" cards, letters and photocopying. I need a very small part for transportation and per diem. (If I ask for $500 is only because that amount is the lower limit here on IndieGoGo).

If you are so kind to give  more than $300, I can make more caps, because another group of voluntaries (who work at another hospital) is also interested in my campaign. I will post news and updates about this new group, as soon as I get more feedback from them.
And you get:
This time I decided to knit 5 sheep wool caps as rewards, with the same pattern and appearance of the other 20 caps. They will also be double-sided
column2: will have the same size and thermal insulation. The colors will vary, so everybody will be happy. If the rewards are not claimed by the end of the month, they will be donated as well.

column1: Acknowledgements:
Specially, to the president of the ""Oncological Patients Association"", Mrs. Martha de Padrón, and all the collaborators who guided, introduced and helped me to carry out the donation.
And to our beloved friend in Bogotá: Amparo Díaz Uribe, inspiration for this campaing, who is fighting hard against cancer. Estamos contigo en pensamiento, palabra y acción.
Conclusion :

The previous campaign was a wonderful experience: I learned a lot and now I deeply appreciate the work of the voluntaries. Above all, the resolution, happiness and hope of the cancer patients is the most inspiring stimulus for me to keep on knitting.
You can also help a lot during this new campaign, just by sharing it on your social media.
Thanks in advance.
Ricardo V.",0.0,0,"3 Campaigns

column1: Kirk Kreutzig is the inventor and founder/sole owner of ORION4Sight Ltd, an Optical Company located in the western suburbs of Chicago.   He is a multi-patent holder whose company was formed to advance the new Vision Technology-driven sunglass lenses and Goggle featured in this campaign.

Kirk has a strong academic background in science and biology and is a world-traveled and a semi-retired scientific/commercial photographer with 45+ years behind the camera.  His years as a scientific photographer was instrumental in his developing the original military night vision technologies, and ORION4Sight’s rapidly expanding line of Consumer Eyewear products.

Kirk has also hinted that new trailblazing O4S Vision products are approaching final development, and that these new eyewear products are expected to improve the vision for countless segments of the rapidly aging global population.  (Stay tuned!  These additional products should be available in the very near future.)

column1:
""O4S Sunglasses Kick A**!""

In conclusion, if you would like to have an entirely New Vision Experience like you've never seen before, these sunglass lenses are for you!

We are ORION4Sight, Ltd.  Thank you for visiting this campaign.  Additional details for this Indiegogo Campaign, and other O4S Eyewear programs being developed, will be posted on our web site:
<span style=""font-weight: normal

You can find us on FACEBOOK.  The more people who are aware of this, the better chances we have to hit our goal and to offer additional significant financial support to the Special Operations Warrior Foundation as well.  So thank you for spreading the word, and for your support.

column2: >You did a previous Crowd-Funding campaign.  Why are you doing another?
column3: >We very much appreciate the support received to date.  Your earlier support helped us to create and distribute the first generation version of the consumer eyewear.  We know even better now how to make world-class eyewear with higher quality frames, and now because of your support are introducing three new eyewear frames and our new Orion4Sight Snow Goggles as well.  Supporting this campaign will help us to create and distribute the next level in eyewear.

column1: ","Please Visit Our New WebpageOrion4Sight.comO4S lenses are different than anything you've looked through before.  These are NOT ordinary sunglasses and are designed as Optical Eyewear FILTERS with a distinguished Military Heritage.  Click the link above to visit our webpage to see the latest O4S styles and information. INTRODUCING...
The Most Advanced Sunglass Lenses
on the Planet!""
“These Sunglasses Kick A** ”

If you want the most awesome and technically superior sunglasses on the planet, this will be the most exciting message you’ll read all year! What's this Campaign About? We are excited to introduce revolutionary sunglasses with lenses with a new Vision Technology, improved frames, and an expanded line including a Snow-Goggle with lenses (with a new proprietary Vision Technology) available only from Orion4Sight. **************************************************************************JUST IN:  Here's a comment from a supporter of this campaign who already received his new ORION4Sight Sunglasses (comment used with Joe Power's permission):""Just ordered a second pair with the black frame. These sunglasses are worth every penny they cost. I've NEVER had a pair like these before. I actually hate to take them off. They actually help seeing at a distance and things are much sharper even in dim lighting. They actually don't make things as dark as the lens would lead you believe. You can actually wear them inside a store and still see just fine. I swear they improve my vision.”Best Regards,Joe Power**************************************************************************In this campaign you'll discover the unique story behind the creation of the lenses in this eyewear, you'll see up-close photos of the Sunglasses and Snow Goggle, you'll learn why we need your support, and you'll learn how you can get a pair of these Sunglasses or Snow Goggle for yourself (and for others) in time for Christmas, all with a $100 savings (while initial stock lasts).
Above are the four new O4S Eyewear Styles (frames in                                          black, gray, white...and an amazing new Snow Goggle too)

These sunglass lenses are so Kick A** that they have the stamp of approval from some of the toughest and most fiercely competitive people on the planet.At the same time, the sunglasses are for anyone regardless of activity level, from the insanely active Weekend Warrior types, all the way to Senior Citizens and others who enjoy more leisurely activities. Please keep in mind that it's not the frames that make these sunglasses so different and remarkable (though the frames are very good).  It's the lenses and the new Lens Technology that creates the magic.                    This woman is wearing the new O4S sunglasses with sleek white frames.

We invite you to take the following ORION4Sight challenge!  1.  Discover HOW our new lenses with unique Vision Technologies can immediately benefit you.2.  Discover WHY the lenses in our ORION4Sight eyewear and O4S Snow Goggles render traditional sunglasses and ski/snow goggles archaic.3.  Then we invite you to try the ORION4Sight sunglasses and/or the O4S Snow Goggle.  Your personal experience is the only validation you need to become a loyal ORION4Sight advocate.WE KNOW these lenses with our new VISION TECHNOLOGIES ARE SPECIAL, and offer this guarantee:100% Guaranteed Quality100% Guaranteed to Perform100% Guaranteed to Please YouOr 100% Refund within 30 days (less shipping) An Exciting New Vision Technology

When you choose these ORION4Sight (O4S) sunglasses, you will look through the very best sunglass lenses you can get.   The sunglasses are stylish and good looking, but it's the lenses utilizing the O4S Vision Technology that makes this superior.Where 99.9% of all sunglasses have colored plastic or glass lenses (and just plain aren't very good), these lenses with our proprietary Vision Technologies are protected by closely guarded trade-secrets.   The lenses puts this eyewear on an entirely different plane than anything you've ever looked through before. Here's a technical graphic illustrating ""Why it Works.""

The Technology makes the difference!When you look through the lenses of these sunglasses and snow goggle, the world looks different, better, more vivid, more clear, more beautiful!  You'll see things you've never even noticed before.  Following are just some of the benefits of the technology you'll enjoy in the lenses of this eyewear:

· O4S lenses provide improved visual acuity (sharpness) making objects appear sharper and in greater detail· O4S lenses provide improved scene contrast· O4S lenses eliminate squinting and eye strain, regardless of weather or lighting conditions· O4S lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratchcoatings· O4S lenses enhance and sharpen your vision while reducing eyestrain· O4S lenses are manufactured to most of the safety requirements of  ANSI Z-87.1       · O4S lenses block 99.9% of UVA and UVB light     ·O4S lenses also provide reduced dark/light transitional times as you move between dark/light environments.                                                This man is wearing the new ORION4Sight                                   Sunglasses with Military Gray FramesHere are 11 Additional Scientifically Documented ORION4SIght Sunglass lens benefits:1.  Visible light is “regulated” by unique O4S optical properties embodied within the  Sunglass lens -- similar to features used in “highly specialized camera filters."" 2.  Colors “similar” to the O4S lens do not deliver the same visual performance.  3.  Optical physicists call this color-paradox “metamerism.” This simply means “Colors which look like O4S lenses seldom perform equally.""  4.  You need only one pair of Sunglasses for ALL Seasons and All Weather Conditions: Proprietary and Synergistic O4S lens features eliminate the necessity of changing lenses or eyewear for different weather or lighting conditions.  5.  The O4S lens may initially look reddish-orange to your eye. Independent optical laboratory tests reveal that a normal and healthy human eye will experience very minimal, if any, subject matter color change when looking through a O4S lens.  6.  The reddish-orange color will slowly and “visually fade” and colors from reflected objects (trees, people, scenes, etc.) will appear normal.  7.  The O4S lens increases color saturation, i.e., reds look “redder,” yellow appears more vibrant, etc.  8.  When it’s cloudy, or foggy or snow is falling, the O4S Lens provides enhanced  distance-viewing, as well as significantly improved terrain and scene detail.  9.  A light silver front surface lens coating (on the Military Gray framed sunglasses only) dramatically reduce eye strain and overwhelming brightness experienced in full sun on new fallen snow, at the beach, or on the water   10.  Anti-fog control is achieved by one of the industry’s best anti-fog coatings covering the inside of the lens.   11.  Regardless of the weather conditions, if you can see better, your performance will  improve wearing an ORION4Sight Sunglasses.
Why we Need your Support

We are developing this new eyewear right now.  We are on an epic quest to help men and women of all ages and activity levels around the world benefit from the technologically superior eyewear. When you support this campaign, you will help us advance the O4S technology around the world as we expand our product lines.For your support you have a choice of some attractive perks (see all the perks lower on this page).
Above is one of the eyewear offered in the campaign:                         O4S Sunglass lenses with new sleek black frames.

This Vision Technology comes from a rich Military heritage...The ORION4Sight Vision Technologies are proudly and deeply rooted in a rich US Military and Law Enforcement heritage. We've been providing special patented eyewear - sunglasses with lenses like no other - to the US Special Operations Commands and Law Enforcement Agencies for many years. The new sunglasses featured in this campaign are a new consumer spin-off version of our own patented Vision Technology that boasts a rich military and law enforcement pedigree.

Military and Law Enforcement versions of the Eyewear   The original Vision Technologies used in the Military eyewear of our creation is patented, researched, and proven for their ability to improve vision under extreme lighting conditions.  These are technologies perfectly suited to spin-off for the new eyewear featured in this campaign.  NOTE:  The sunglasses in this campaign are not the military version, but are the new consumer spin-off version boasting the new lenses created for this new line of eyewear.
Watch this video to hear what this Cyclist says about the lenses in his O4S Sunglasses

Alan Laytham, supporter of our earlier Campaign,                                      is wearing the 1st generation O4S eyewear in                                                             a recent road race
Another early supporter wrote the following
column2: “...I LOVE THESE SUNGLASSES!  I have several pair of sunglasses, and none of them hold a candle to these!   They are comfortable, the side frameadjusts up and down for a custom fit, and the lens itself...well,what can I say?  I don't have any glare tormenting my eyes when Iwear these.  BEST EVER, and I love supporting the mission too!”-Dr. Rick Kirschner

column1: GREAT NEWS for YOU!  What all this means that you can now enjoy these new sunglass lenses which will help take your game, your activity, and your vision experience to an entirely new level.
A Hawaiian musician wearing the O4S                                     eyewear during a local songfest

Whether your game involves high intensity activities, singing in a band, playing on a beach, casually working in the yard or tooling around town with the kids, these sunglasses with the new lens technology will enhance your vision experience.  And the better you see, the better you’ll perform.
Your Reward for Supporting This Campaign

You are in the right place at the right time because for the first time you can get these sunglasses in a choice of three new stylish frames (in classic black, sleek white, and military gray) and you can get the new Snow Goggle as well.       When you get the O4S Sunglasses they’ll be tucked into a white microfiber cleaning bag inside of a rugged protective case (see photo above).  Included is a set of instructions that explain correct usage of the eyewear so you can achieve maximum visual benefits.  (When was the last time you got instructions for use with a pair of sunglasses?  Never, right?  These sunglasses are different!)You Can Choose From the Following Four Perks:
1.  O4S Sunglasses in Classic Black Frames
$99 (Future retail price will be $199)

In classic black frames, these Orion4Sight sunglasses also have a new frame design which is simply awesome looking! They too have 6-base lens for improved optics and have antifog-coating on the inside of the lens, and hard-coating on the outside of the lens for durability and scratch resistance.  These look so cool, and have the O4S lenses that'll change the way you see the world. (And they come with a 100% money-back guarantee.)
2.  O4S Sunglasses in Sleek Military Gray Wrap-around Frames
$99 (Future retail price will be $225)

This is the same frame used in our military and law enforcement version - built for toughness! These sunglasses are great looking and stylish as well!  Technically, they have the same vision characteristics that the black and white framed sunglasses have.

The outer lens coating is harder than most, making cleaning easier as well as giving a level of water repellent function for enhanced vision.  (And like the other perks, these come with a 100% money-back guarantee.)
3.  O4S Sunglasses in Elegant White Frames
$99 (Future retail price will be $199)

In elegant white frames, these O4S sunglasses have a new frame design and look fantastic!They have a 6-base lens for improved optics and have antifog-coating on the inside of the lens, and hard-coating on the outside of the lens for durability and scratch resistance.  They have lenses with the new Vision Technology that's unavailable in any other sunglasses. (And these also come with a complete 100% satisfaction money-back guarantee.)
4.  The O4S World-Class Snow Goggle$165 (Future retail price will be $265)

We are thrilled to introduce the ORION4Sight Snow Goggle! This is the only goggle in the world with the O4S lens technology.  It is good looking and will be admired on the slopes and elsewhere (and comes in an attractive carrying case and with instructions as show in the photo above).  It has soft foam that gives complete face seal and extreme comfort regardless of temperatures.  It has 360 degree air vents, and the open cell foam allows air to pass but keeps foreign particles out.  It has Anti-fog coating on the inside that keeps lens from fogging when the temperatures vary from inside the goggle to the outside.  It comes with a handsome white case with an attachment for hooking on a belt and storage when not in use.  The outer lens coating is harder than most, making cleaning easier as well as giving a level of water repellent function for enhanced vision while in use.  This Snow Goggle is simply world-class (and of course, this comes with a 100% money-back guarantee too!). Who invented this Vision Technology?

Kirk Kreutzig is the inventor and founder/sole owner of ORION4Sight Ltd, an Optical Company located in the western suburbs of Chicago.   He is a multi-patent holder whose company was formed to advance the new Vision Technology-driven sunglass lenses and Goggle featured in this campaign.

Kirk has a strong academic background in science and biology and is a world-traveled and a semi-retired scientific/commercial photographer with 45+ years behind the camera.  His years as a scientific photographer was instrumental in his developing the original military night vision technologies, and ORION4Sight’s rapidly expanding line of Consumer Eyewear products.Kirk has also hinted that new trailblazing O4S Vision products are approaching final development, and that these new eyewear products are expected to improve the vision for countless segments of the rapidly aging global population.  (Stay tuned!  These additional products should be available in the very near future.)
Kirk Kreutzig, the inventor

Superb Gifts!""                      Imagine the excitement of those to whom you give these sunglasses or Snow Goggle as a gift.  The O4S Sunglasses and/or Snow Goggle will make a huge impact on the gift receiver, especially when they look through them for the first time.  They’ll think of you and your generous gift each time they use the eyewear - you'll be a hero to them for giving such a wonderful gift! *Please note that this offer is while initial supplies last!  We'll ship the sunglasses to supporters in the order received.  So please go ahead and support this campaign early so you can get the Sunglasses or Snow goggle sent to you quickly.
Your Support Also Helps a Remarkable Charity

Because of our strong military heritage and with your earlier support, we are pleased to have already donated several thousands of dollars to the Special Operations Warrior Foundation (it’s the same charity the New York Yankees support). We are excited to announce we will again be donating 5% of proceeds from this campaign to the Foundation.                                                     The Special Operations Warrior Foundation is a top-rated nonprofit organization that supports the military's Special Operations Forces and their families through three primary programs:
1.  College scholarships for the surviving children of fallen Special Operations Forces
2.  Family & Educational counseling, including in-home tutoring, as well as advocacy support
3.  Immediate $3,000 financial grants to severely-wounded Special Operations Forces service members.  Thank you for helping support those who sacrifice to keep us safe and strong!
30-day 100% Money-Back Satisfaction Guarantee

Give the O4S eyewear ""the eye-test.""  Put them on, try them out.  Just GIVE IN and take the ORION4Sight challenge!1.  You have now discovered HOW our new Vision Technologies can immediately benefit you.2.  You have now discovered WHY our Orion4Sight eyewear and O4S Snow Goggles render traditional sunglasses and ski/snow goggles archaic.3.  Do it now!  ""Give into Temptation"" and try the ORION4Sight eyewear and/or the O4S Snow Goggle.  Your personal experience is the only validation you need to become a loyal ORION4Sight advocate.WE ARE CONFIDENT YOU WILL LOVE OUR O4S VISION PRODUCTS!100% Guaranteed Quality100% Guaranteed to Perform100% Guaranteed to Please YouOr 100% unconditional refund within 30 days (less shipping)We hope you see why this eyewear is special.  We ask for your support and believe you’ll fall in love with the sunglasses and snow goggle as soon as you slip them on. We have something unique and special here, and we know it.  That’s why we offer this bold 30-day 100% Money-back Satisfaction Guarantee.

Please Spread the Word Through Facebook, Twitter and elsewhereWhen your family and friends see you wearing these sunglasses, they’ll want to try them on.  After they do they will likely want a pair too.  (Be careful – they may want to keep yours!)  Whether or not you are able to support this campaign by choosing a perk, we ask that you support it by sharing it with your friends and acquaintances who wear high-quality sunglasses.   We ask that you share it with those you know who are always looking for an edge in the activities they’re involved in. We ask that you share it with those who demand the very best in whatever they do.   We ask that you share it with men and women of all ages, who simply want a pair of extraordinary sunglasses or snow goggles.                                                                                                                       O4S Sunglasses in Gray Frames

O4S Sunglasses Kick A**!""In conclusion, if you would like to have an entirely New Vision Experience like you've never seen before, these sunglass lenses are for you!We are ORION4Sight, Ltd.  Thank you for visiting this campaign.  Additional details for this Indiegogo Campaign, and other O4S Eyewear programs being developed, will be posted on our web site:

You can find us on FACEBOOK.  The more people who are aware of this, the better chances we have to hit our goal and to offer additional significant financial support to the Special Operations Warrior Foundation as well.  So thank you for spreading the word, and for your support.                                       FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Kilah is a beautiful 3 year old that was violently injured on May 16th while in the care of a family member. Originally, her injuries were not considered something she could survive, but with the coming together of friends and family, their prayers are being answered.

Kilah has a very long way to go, and there are many things the family will need to help with her continued care and therapy. That’s where we come in! We are friends – old and new – that have come together to support this cause!
We hope you will join us as we support Kilah Davenport, her mother Kirbi Davenport and her grandparents Leslie and Brian Davenport.
Learn more about Kilah’s story at http://teamkilah.wordpress.com/author/teamkilah/
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp
All proceeds (less paypal fees) go to help provide for Kilah's needs and her ongoing medical expenses.
<div>
The Impact
There is nothing more precious than the innocence of a child. Kilah needs all of our help. Thank you for your contributions.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Visit: http://teamkilah.wordpress.com/author/teamkilah/ to find out the latest on Kilah's progress
Also, If you live in North Carolina you can go to any State Employees' Credit Union branch and donate directly to the Kilah Davenport Fund.

Sean is our brave boy that has endured so much in his life, but always flashing a big smile that could light up a room..TheSean (the nickname he gave himself) is Awesome!
<div class=""mhl"">

Born with numerous heart defects (Tricuspid Atresia, HLHS, Transposition of the Great Ateries, Hypoplasia Aortic Arch, and Pulmonary Atrery Anastomosis), numerous major surgeries that include the Norwood Procedure, Hemi Fontan/Bidirectional Glenn Shunt, Thrombectomy of Left Pulmonary Artery, Repair of Coarctation of Aorta, Fenestration , Removal of clotted Cortex Fentestration tube, numerous cardi...ac caths, and Plication of Diaphragm paralyzed during surgery.  He was diagnosed with Protien Losing Enteropathy, and is Immuno suppressed.   In 2009 he underwent another open heart to reverse a previous surgery.  That was supposed to help with the Protien Losing Enteropathy (a complication with the Fontan), it actually made it worse.  They then told us the only way to fix the problem was a heart transplant.  So they did all the blood testing required to qualify for a new heart.  When we got those results we learned he had a very high amount of antibodies and he would undergo Rituxin treatments, and IgG treatments to help try to lower.  Those treatments would seem like they were working but when the doctors would stop treatments to see if they stayed stable.  They would multiply back very fast.  In March of 2010, they then told us that he would not qualify for or recieve a heart transplant because of the antibodies and how unstable they were.  Now they did a surgery to place a port in his abdominal wall to drain fluid that causes fluid overload making it hard from him to breath, and just do everyday normal things most of us don't think about.  He overcomes obstacles daily, with a big smile..What a joy and a blessing we have been given.
<div class=""text_exposed_root text_exposed"">

All donations will go to fund travel expenses back and forth to his appointments every 2 weeks for his cardiologist to drain fluid off his stomach (acsites),  We have to drive him 2 and a half hours one way to these appointments every 2 weeks, we spend the entire day away from home on these days that also requires us to stop and eat.

Also will help with any mechanical issues we may have with our car, and will go to help fund a vacation for him because he is homebound and unable to socialize with kids and people a lot of the time.  .

Any donations would help lessen the financial burden that our family has.  It would be nice not to have to worry about having enough funds to go back and forth to his appointments at least for a little while, and to provide him a get away that we can not provide for him at this time.
I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can't help, please share our campaign, also to those who pray, prayers are welcome also.
If you have any questions, or would just like to know more about us Like our page, and leave Encouraging Thoughts for Sean..

RimTech is being designed for Project Overlord by former department heads at Nokia, in charge of Nokia's Mobility and Global Positioning Technology departments. Progetan: www.progetan.com is designing our product from start to finish. Also hired for the Patents, is one of the top Intellectual Property companies, Origiin IP Solutions: www.origiin.com that specializes in technology design patents. We have filed the patent for Project Overlord- Rimtech, Patent Application Number 62064489. Together, this group makes up the Project Overlord design team focusing on one goal...to stop wheel theft around the globe,

column1: All of the proceeds we receive from our Indiegogo campaign will be used to create, manufacture, grow and market RIMTECH globally. We aspire to help everyone avoid the horrible feeling of being robbed, when it comes to their vehicle wheels or their vehicle itself. ","As seen on CBS NEWS, Bloomberg News, BisNow, Technical.ly and more...RimTech is the World's FIRST Patent-Pending Anti-Theft Alarm & Tracking device for Automobile Wheels developed by former Nokia designers.  RimTech is being designed for Project Overlord by former department heads at Nokia, in charge of Nokia's Mobility and Global Positioning Technology departments. Progetan: www.progetan.com is designing our product from start to finish. Also hired for the Patents, is one of the top Intellectual Property companies, Origiin IP Solutions: www.origiin.com that specializes in technology design patents. We have filed the patent for Project Overlord- Rimtech, Patent Application Number 62064489. Together, this group makes up the Project Overlord design team focusing on one goal...to stop wheel theft around the globe, OUR WEBSITE RimTech on BisNow.com newsAutoblog.com news on Project OverlordSpeedville.com news on Rimtech
Mignews international news on Project Overlord- Russia
Japan Cars international news on Project Overlord  Rimtech- Japan
How will we use your funding?
$500,000 for product design, testing and manufacturing of our first 10,000 units.
$250,000 for company infrastructure, perks, shipping, product insurance, packaging & marketing to make our project available to the world.

All of the proceeds we receive from our Indiegogo campaign will be used to create, manufacture, grow and market RIMTECH globally. We aspire to help everyone avoid the horrible feeling of being robbed, when it comes to their vehicle wheels or their vehicle itself. Our production and development timeline calls for Project Overlord's first product, RIMTECH, to be in the public's hands by October 2015.
Perks? Here is what's on the list...
Our Twitter hashtag is #dontwakeuplikethis for a reason...we don't want anyone to have to deal with the loss of their property they've worked so hard to buy.
And before you ask...what about wheel locks? Watch the video...

Most of you know Russ Miller. He's been on the scene playing drums for several years in many bands. Needless to say he's an excellent player, and has a deep passion for his craft. As well as being an artist in various projects he is also the drummer and Staff Sgt. in the military. Above all of that he is my friend, and he's in trouble right now. Recently he has sustained a very severe injury to his index finger. Without getting into too much detail it involved a 3 inch nail shooting through it and shattering a lot of bone. Russ now needs surgery but due to his being unable to work and his bills up to date from this injury, surgery is not a viable option.It only leaves him with one other option, AMPUTATION. We can not let this happen. It would debilitate his ability to play drums, and even function in day to day life. I know that the very thought of this makes any musician,any person cringe. It is my hope we can help raise enough money to help him pay for this surgery which involves a piece of prosthetic bone being implanted into his finger. Lets make sure we can keep enjoying Russ' playing for years to come! We have a chance to do some real good here, lets do it. Thanks

ALEXANDER WAS BORN WITH SEVERE GASTROESOPHAGEAL REFLUX DISEASE. HE'S HAD A QUITE A FEW MAJOR SURGERIES, AND SPENT MANY MONTHS LIVING AT CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL IN LOS ANGELES. AT AGE 4 HE HAD TO HAVE A G-TUBE PLACED IN HIS STOMACH.

HAVING A G-TUBE CAUSED ALEXANDER TO MISS OUT ON A LOT ACTIVITIES THAT KIDS AT HIS AGE LOVE TO TO....FOR INSTANCE, HES NEVER BEEN ON A SLIP AND SLIDE, NEVER BEEN TO AN AMUSEMENT PARK, CANT DO SIT-UPS OR PLAY FOOTBALL, OR SKATEBOARD....ALWAYS HAVING TO WORRY ABOUT KNOCKED IN THE STOMACH AND THE G-TUBE BECOMING DISLODGED.

BUT ALEXANDER IS DIFFERENT FROM KIDS HIS AGE IN OTHER WAYS AS WELL...A GREAT EXAMPLE WOULD BE THAT HE HAS NEVER NOT ONCE TOLD ME ""NO"" (IM HIS MOM), HE NEVER ASKS FOR ANYTHING...NOT NEW CLOTHES OR NEW TOYS OR VIDEO GAMES...NOTHING....

HE IS THE TYPE OF KID THAT WILL GO PLAY WITH THE KID THAT ALL THE OTHER KIDS ARE TEASING AND LEAVING OUT AT RECESS TIME. HE IS THE KID WHO GOES WITH ME EVERY SUNDAY TO TAKE AN ELDERLY WOMANS TRASH CANS TO THE CURB FOR HER, EVEN THOUGH WEVE NEVER EVEN MET HER..WE SAW HER STRUGGLING TO DO IT HERSELF ONE DAY....AND WEVE JUST BEEN SNEAKING ON OVER THERE AND DOING IT FOR HER EVER SINCE...BUT IN THE 3 YEARS WEVE TAKEN HER TRASH OUT....HE'S NEVER COMPLAINED....

I WILL SHARE ONE MORE STORY WITH YOU .....IT WAS EASTER 2007 AND ALEXANDER WAS ABOUT 3 YEARS OLD....HE WAS IN THE HOSPITAL AND WE ALREADY BEEN THERE A FEW MONTHS....I WENT DOWN TO THE MCDONALDS THAT THEY HAVE AT THE HOSPITAL AND I GOT HIM A HAPPY MEAL...WHEN HE PULLED THE TOY OUT OF THE BAG...IT WAS THE GIRL TOY, IT WAS A PINK HELLO KITTY COMPACT THAT OPENED UP AND HAD A MIRROR AND LIP GLOSS INSIDE....

I THOUGHT FOR SURE HE WOULD BE DISAPPOINTED, HERE IT IS EASTER AND HE CANT GO OUTSIDE FOR THE HOSPITAL EGG HUNT AND I HAD NO MONEY SINCE I WAS LIVING IN THE HOSPITAL WITH HIM, SO I KNOW I WAS ONLY ABLE TO GET HIM A LITTLE STUFFED BUNNY THAT HOLIDAY.....

THIS WAS ALEXANDER'S RESPONSE....""OH LOOK MOMMY, HOW PRETTY, NOW I HAVE SOMETHING TO GIVE YOU FOR EASTER""

I KNOW THAT MIGHT NOT SEEM THAT SPECIAL TO MOST PEOPLE, BUT TO ME IT MEANT THE WORLD, AND I STILL HAVE MY HELLO KITTY LIP GLOSS.

THIS CHILD IS AMAZING, HE IS ALWAYS GIVING, AND I WISH I WAS ABLE TO GIVE HIM ALL THE THINGS I KNOW HE WANTS....

SO HERES WHERE THE NOT SO SAD STUFF STARTS......

LAST MONTH ALEXANDER WAS ABLE TO HAVE HIS G-TUBE REMOVED!!!!!!

THATS VERY BIG NEWS!!!! WE ARE VERY EXCITED TO GO TRY ALL THE THINGS HE COULD NOT DO BEFORE!!!!

HOWEVER...MINOR LITTLE SET BACK....THERE HAVE BEEN SOME COMPLICATIONS WITH THAT AND WERE GOING TO NEED TO GO BACK IN TO THE HOSPITAL FOR ONE MORE SURGERY....(HOPEFULLY THE LAST ONE)

GIVING ALEXANDER TICKETS TO DISNEYLAND FOR HIM AND HIS LITTLE BROTHER (SORRY BUT YOU KNOW YOU CANT LEAVE HIM BEHIND) WOULD MEAN SO MUCH. AS OF NOW HE IS A LITTLE SCARED ABOUT YET ANOTHER SURGERY AND I THOUGHT MAYBE IF HE KNEW THAT HE WOULD BE GOING TO DISNEYLAND WHEN HES DONE RECOVERING...WELL MAYBE THAT MIGHT NOT MAKE IT SO HARD.....

ANYWAY IF YOU CAN HELP OUT...PLEASE DO....WE APPRECIATE ANYTHING AND EVERYTHING....AND THANKS FOR TAKING THE TIME TO READ THIS!!!

<h3><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
<h3><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px

Traditional Fitness and Yoga mats are often clumsy and frustrating to roll up. We all have seen people walking out of the gym or yoga studio with their mats half unrolled or even falling out of their bags. Not to mention how many rolled up mats unroll themselves into a mess in the back of a car. Yes of course, you can use straps or even stuff them into a fitness bag, but there has to be a better way… and there is!
Innovation : Solution
Our Inventors, Aaron Thornton &
column2: Father Jack Thornton, fitness and yoga enthusiast, decided to find a solution to solve this annoying problem. They set a goal to design a fitness / yoga mat that will roll up by itself and stay rolled up tightly while traveling or in storage without the need for straps or bags.

column1: Inspired by a simple slap-on wristband and through many trials and errors, they created a prototype of the very first self-rolling yoga mat. In the process, they not only invented a mat that rolls up by itself, but they also created a mat that stays completely flat while it is in use. Although the two self-rolling bands were still fully exposed in this early stage of the development, they knew they had something so unique and innovative that they began the process of applying for a U.S. Utility Patent.

Aaron, along with co-founder Dino May, then paired up with a long-time friend Yu Tsai, creative director of 88 Phases and celebrity/fashion photographer. The team began collaborating on the next phase of the design process to create a mat that is both functional and aesthetically beautiful.
Working intensively for a year, together with the help of engineers, product designers, and art director, YoYo Mats was created and our patent was granted!
<h3><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
1. Custom-designed anti-slip surface pattern helps your grip even when the mat is wet.
column7:
s=193f493417af36874b61c5c6c2a1dd47"" src=""""/>

 

2. Custom-designed round corners.
column13:
s=17ae4b41b444931d0ec55b4543d82b94"" src=""""/>

 

3. Dual-layered and 5.5 mm thick to provide a perfect balance of comfort, support and portability. Its light weight design makes travel a breeze.
column19:
s=546c17699245924a7c585d0c82ca4d22"" src=""""/>

 

4. Closed-cell construction seals mat from moisture, bacteria and odor.

5. 72” long and extra wide 28” to accommodate self-rolling bands so they are not intrusive to your fitness practice.
column31:
s=792bfeeb50b827325dfc39831f836bb5"" src=""""/>

 

6. Made using TPE - an eco-alternative material that’s biodegradable, latex-free, PVC-free, and free of: DEHP, DBP, BBP, DINP, DIDP, and DNOP phthalates.

Short Summary

I'm Maddy and I love yoga. The calming effects of yoga and meditation have truly changed my life and it is pivotal that I share knowledge and experience with others.

After moving from a small hippie community in northern California to the fast-paced life of Washington, DC I experienced a drastic change of lifestyle that was at times a bit overwhelming. Yoga helped to calm my nerves and find center in the day-today. Anxiety affects nearly one-in-five Americans and costs the US almost $42 billion per year. With our generation's increasing daily stresses it has become one of the most common psychiatric disorders of young Americans. 

It wasn't until I fully immersed myself in a daily yoga practice that I was able to find my inner sanctuary. I have seen firsthand the calming effects of yoga and meditation on close friends. It is for this reason that I hope to become a yoga instructor. To share the yoga community and passion with others seeking their inner peace.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Tuition for the six-month course with Capitol Hill Yoga will cost $2,790. The additional $210 will help to cover Indiegogo fundraising fees.

For your generosity I want to give something back!

column1: • For every $25 you are invited to Spring 2015 Yoga in the Park as instructed by me.
• For every $50 you will be given a Gaiam Restore Thirsty Yoga Hand Towel made especially for Ashtanga and hot yoga sessions.
• For every $75 you are invited to attend a personal one-on-one yoga consultation with yours truly.
• For every $100 you are invited to attend a yoga workshop beginning Spring 2015, location and topic TBD.

Even if my goal of $3,000 is not met, every penny you donate will go towards my training and I will contribute the difference.

The Training

200-Hour yogahour® Teacher Training: Sept 2014 - Feb 2015

with Darren Rhodes, Stacey DeGrasse, Betsy Poos, Brigette Finley, and Alexis Finley
column3:
title=""yogahour""/>

The Capitol Hill Yoga - yogahour® Teacher Training program is a 200-hour Yoga Alliance approved program. At completion of the program, graduates are eligible to become certified yogahour® teachers and register with Yoga Alliance as a Registered Hatha Yoga Teacher.

Yogahour® is a flow style of yoga that emphasizes form via shape, safety, and refinement instructions. Yogahour aims to be the most doable yet difficult one-hour flow class offered anywhere. Many flow classes lack form and many form classes lack flow.

Receive the tools to be a skillful yogahour practioner and teacher while deepening your knowledge of yoga history, philosphy, anatomy, and asana to empower teaching any form of hatha yoga.

The training will convene four days a month for six consecutive months. Students will have home assignments and are expected to regularly attend yogahour classes.

The Impact

Yoga is a valuable exercise that helps one reconnect with their inner being. Particularly in our busy and stressful lives, it is important to tune in and challenge oneself to consider what is important in life. 

I am so excited to help alleviate our society by meditation and regular yoga practice!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, you can make a world of difference by getting the word out and making noise about the Maddy Does Yoga campaign! 

Please share with your friends!

Namaste.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div> <h3><span class=""Apple-style-span"" style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >RESUKO© is a new, exciting and innovative logic riddle from Switzerland. It is versatile, comes in many different styles and forms and therefore arouses enthusiasm in both young and old. It has the potential to might be considered equivalent with similar puzzles such as Sudoku, Battleship and Kenken. We launch this campaign on Indiegogo to spread the word about RESUKO© and to to raise the fundings for its distribution. We have been working for years on its fialization and now we are ready to go worldwide. You will get our great riddle RESUKO© and much more by purchasing our perks… Enjoy the drive!

column1: Genesis

column2: >For me as an eager riddle solver – always in the search for new riddles – Sudoku, the on all sides present logic riddle, slowly became monotonous in the course of time: As Sudoku – invented by brilliant Mr. Leonhard Euler (1707-1783) – has its fixed dimensions of 9x9 fields and the numbers 1 to 9 are not expandables.

>My mathematical analysis proved – without rotations, reflexions and exchanges – there exist only 46'656 different possibilities: 24x24x81. Therefore I was of the opinion that it was time for a new riddle to be invented: A riddle with infinite possibilities of both dimensions and forms and a closeness to global interest as for example cars have.

>Everyone is sold on riddles of any kinds and velocity. Racing however is dangerous in real life, so we have brought the race on safe ground: Paper. Afterwards the streets came into play. Over time this riddle developped from an idea to a sketch. The first RESUKO© arose in June, 2009:

column1: From ""RACE"" to ""RESUKO""

When this idea has been consolidating, the question concerning a powerful and meaningful name has arisen. The final name “RESUKO” has been developed out of various initial names such as""highway riddles"", ""racing riddles"", ""Racetrack"" and ""Race"". The word ""Resuko"" is descended from the Japanese and means “race car”. My enthusiasm for RESUKO© did not remain undiscovered for a long time and the first inquiries for test riddles quickly arrived from the closer circle of acquaintances. The received feedback of the initial test phase was overwhelming throughout and therefore my decision was made to transform RESUKO© into a product. To discover the possibilities of RESUKO© we created a physical generator out of wooden cubes with which we simulated various riddle types and thus simulations discovered the infinite extendibility of RESUKO©. The design of the single elements has changed in the course of progression, so that in the end we figured out the most expressive symbolism: At first the circuit contained two lanes and there was also a tribune in the grid.

Finally RESUKO© was ripe for distribution. As manual production of riddles is principally uneconomical GameSky AG was founded, with which we planned to reach the zone of profit by means of an electronic riddle generator. Due to the fact that our business partner was mostly occupied with his own projects RESUKO© got neglected. In the meantime the company has been dissolved and the riddles – still manually created – are being provided once again directly by the inventor himself. The reader’s and publisher’s feedback on the new riddle RESUKO© was and remains exclusively positive. RESUKO© appeared in various newspapers such as “Tagblatt Zürich”, “Zürichsee Zeitung” and “MixLogik” over years. Our goal is to spread RESUKO© worldwide and not only locally since every single riddle solver is pleased with a new exciting riddle. That is where we need your help as a community to make RESUKO© popular and achieve our campaign goal. The advantage of RESUKO© is its linguistic independence, except its instruction manual.
Description
RESUKO© is a logic riddle, as for example Sudoku, Bimaru, Kenken etc. ONLY BETTER!

column1: Along with the initial idea of a newspaper’s and magazines’ riddle arose the expansion of RESUKO© into the digital world by means of a mobile application for iPhone, Android and Tablets, which we aim as an additional goal of this campaign. We also want children to enjoy RESUKO©: So we created a stamp set to create your own RESUKO© and painting which is ready for production.

RESUKO©’s inventor, Beat Almstädt, working as a full-time self-employed graphics designer for decades, hence – always in search of innovative and fresh ideas for his customers – has extended his creativity also to riddles. RESUKO© is only one of his numerous riddle inventions, nevertheless RESUKO© has the biggest opportunities to be established in the worldwide riddle market, thus we have selected RESUKO© for our campaign on indiegogo. The motives to launch a campagin on Indiegogo are easy: The publishers in Switzerland are relatively small and according to that have a limited sales and territory market only. RESUKO© was already published in Switzerland in newspapers, magazines and even professional riddle books and attained huge popularity among the riddle fans. We would like to provide worldwide access to RESUKO© and preserve its high quality and a reliable costumers’ service.

column2: >The donated capital will be used as follows:

column1: <ul>
• 50'000 USD for generator’s development (figures are based on the first efforts by GameSky AG)
• 5'000 USD for trademark protection
• 5'000 USD for public relations, advertisement and marketing
• 5'000 USD for programming of online shop
• 10'000 USD for development of mobile application as an additional goal.

One of our targets is also the realisation of a mobile application. The mobile app conveys the impression to the riddle solvers, that they are actually racing on their device. This proves again that RESUKO© is able to survive on modern platforms besides traditional media such as newspapers and magazines. If our goal of USD 65'000 is exceeded by USD 10'000, we will be able to program the mobile app as well.
